What fact-check ?: WhatsApp text says , among things , Chinese created virus main cities China suffer pandemic .
Explanation: The cities of Shanghai and Beijing registered cases of COVID-19 and even adopted restrictive measures against the coronavirus. The Chinese economy has indeed felt the economic effects of the outbreak, differently from what the piece of disinformation states. The country's main stock exchange indices, CSI 300 and compound Shanghai, fell 8.7% and 6.4% only in March, respectively.

What fact-check ?: A chain message circulated Tuesday , January 14 , warning people avoid going Shangri-La Plaza , mall Mandaluyong City , supposed case Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome ( SARS ) reported one mall 's medical clinics .
Explanation: The Department of Health (DOH) and Healthway Medical both issued advisories denying the claim in the chain message.

What fact-check ?: Stores supermarkets Veracruz , Mexico close due coronavirus . Local government asks buy supplies .
Explanation: Authorities ask not to make panic purchases. As of March 18, stores have not said they will close.

What fact-check ?: The peak virus two weeks . Normally , two weeks infections occur , two weeks calm two weeks goes .
Explanation: The chance of getting SARS-CoV-2 only comes down to the next two weeks. What lasts two weeks or less is the incubation period.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus created lab patented .
Explanation: The patents circulating are linked to other coronaviruses and a patent for a virus does not mean it's man made.

What fact-check ?: Misleading video claims Chinese market cause coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Video claims that a Chinese market brought the COVID-19. Misleading video.

What fact-check ?: Saline solution kill coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: Multiple posts an weibo, Twitter and FB
Explanation: Doctor and WHO deny this claim.

What fact-check ?: A post claims wear disposable mask blue side sick white side .
Explanation: The only way to wear a mask is with blue face out, experts say to AFP.

What fact-check ?: `` Patent `` new '' coronavirus expired 22nd , today '' .
Explanation: As noted above, the patent for the vaccine for this new Wuhan strain did not expire on January 22, 2020. That patent is related to the SARS epidemic, which killed more than 800 people after it broke out in China in 2002.

What fact-check ?: "There 's magically already vaccine available . ''
Explanation: Anthony S. Fauci, a top official at the National Institutes of Health (NIH), told Bloomberg Law that a potential vaccine "could move into early-stage human testing in the next three months."

What fact-check ?: Warning : virus spreading Italy ( January 22 ) .
Explanation: This news is not confirmed by any national or local newspaper nor by the Italian government.

What fact-check ?: Russian scientists cure fighting new Chinese virus .
Who said/posted it?: Sputnik, and then other media outlets in the Balkan region
Explanation: There has been no new information on Triazavirin drug testing or its results. By the date of publication of this analysis, Triazavirin had not been confirmed as a cure for the new coronavirus. Because the title of Sputnik's article claims that the Russian drug Triazavirin for COVID-19 is "ready", although the article does not contain this claim, the article receives clickbait and misinformation ratings.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus outbreak linked eating bats .
Who said/posted it?: Emma Parker, writer at the Daily Star (and many others)
Explanation: Bats are known natural reservoirs for coronaviruses. However, many other animals, such as civet cats and snakes, can also carry these viruses. There is currently not enough evidence to conclude that the 2019 coronavirus outbreak resulted from people eating bats in Wuhan, China.

What fact-check ?: Chinese influencer accused causing coronavirus outbreak eating bat soup .
Explanation: The footage was filmed in 2016 in Micronesia, and not in China.

What fact-check ?: There first case Venezuela Bolivar state .
Who said/posted it?: Americo De Grazia, AlbertoNews (TW) + WhatsApp chain
Explanation: The Association of Doctors in the State of Bolivar has publicly denied the information.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus created lab order destroy Chinese economy . The vaccine already available .
Who said/posted it?: Serbian news agency, and then dozen of media in Balkan region
Final rating: Fake news, conspiracy theory, manipulation of facts, disinformation, clickbait
Explanation: Claims that the "mutation of the virus corona was caused artificially in the laboratory" and that it was a "biological war" and that the virus was "released to weaken the Chinese economy" are rated as conspiracy theories because there is no evidence or argument for them.

What fact-check ?: `` [ The coronavirus ] “ new ” yet lab-created patented 2015 '' .
Who said/posted it?: Chris Kirckof and Jordan Sather on Facebook and Twitter
Explanation: The post references the Wuhan coronavirus, but the patent filed is clearly stated to be for the SARS coronavirus, which caused the 2003 outbreak. Neither the SARS nor Wuhan coronavirus is lab-created; evidence points to an animal reservoir as the source of infection.

What fact-check ?: Doctors said entire Wuhan populaiton die novel coronavirus .
Explanation: Authorities never said that and US CDC said most people will recover on their own.

What fact-check ?: `` They create diseases offer vaccines . There already patent attenuated coronavirus . ''
Explanation: The Pirbright Institute has a patent for an attenuated form of a different strain of coronavirus, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV). It only affects poultry.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus may spread due consumption bat soup , according scientists .
Explanation: There is no evidence to support the claim that the consumption of bat soup is connected to the transmisson of the 2019-nCoV. One recent study indicates that the new virus does share genetic information with other kinds of coroviruses that infect bats, but it is still unclear which animals may have transmitted the virus to humans. Analysing a genetic database, researchers concluded that Chinese snakes are the most likely reservoir for the new pathogen, but the hypothesis has yet to be tested experimentally.

What fact-check ?: A Chinese person , taken Kansai airport ( Osaka , Japan ) hospital , run away could tested .
Explanation: According to the Kansai Airport Quarantine Station, this information is absolutely false.

What fact-check ?: A new case novel coronavirus registered Saudi Arabia . A nurse India diagnosed sepcific strain virus .
Who said/posted it?: Original post was from the "Athens News Agency-Macedonian Press Agency"
Explanation: "Acording to Dr. Tarik Al Azraqi, head of the commitee for infectious diseases in Saudi Arabia, the nurse was diagnosed and received treatment for MERS not 2019-nCoV."

What fact-check ?: `` The new fad disease called “ coronavirus ” sweeping headlines . Funny enough , patent coronavirus filed 2015 granted 2018 . ''
Explanation: All of the posts link to patents that are related to two different viruses in the coronavirus family. There is no patent related to the new virus

What fact-check ?: `` So let get straight virus . It ’ “ new ” yet lab created patented 2015 ( development since 03 ’ ) . ''
Explanation: All of the posts link to patents that are related to two different viruses in the coronavirus family. There is no patent related to the new virus

What fact-check ?: A Chinese woman Wuhan arrived France suspected symptoms coronavirus .
Explanation: The Chinese embassy in France confirmed the presence of this Chinese woman in France and said that she gave reassuring news. According to French authorities, investigations are underway, but this suspicious case has never been officially reported.

What fact-check ?: That 2015 research article lab-made coronavirus referred current outbreak .
Explanation: It was an opinion piece, and while facts used in the article appear accurate, it did not refer to the current coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: That China-centered coronvirus infected 2.8 million people killed 112,000 .
Explanation: This was a wild exaggeration of the facts. It supposedly relied on reporting from "covert intelligence sources." At the time of the story, some 900 people had been infected and 26 had died.

What fact-check ?: There ’ ‘ coronavirus patent ’ , FEMA ‘ proposes martial law ’ , Gates Foundation predicted virus , ‘ funded group owns virus patent ’ , coronavirus ‘ created lab ’ ‘ bioweapon population control ’ .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: “ Confirmed cases ” novel coronavirus 2019 nCoV recorded Philippine Bank Communications ( PBCom ) Tower Makati City , according message circulated Friday , January 24 .
Explanation: Speaking to reporters on January 24, Health Undersecretary Eric Domingo maintained that there is still no confirmed case of the 2019 nCov in the Philippines. The management of PBCom Tower also said there is “no truth” to the information.

What fact-check ?: A salesman Medellín 's El Hueco market sent hospital coronavirus symptoms .
Explanation: Colombia's Ministry of Health reports no confirmed cases of coronavirus infections in Colombia. Medellín's Secretary of Health also reports no cases in their city.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus patented Pirbright University .
Explanation: Coronaviruses are a group of similar looking viruses. The patent by Pirbright University is for the Avian Infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) which is found in fowls, pheasants and turkeys. This patent is not linked to the current 2019-novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: The virus created humans patented .
Explanation: The patents exist but are not for the current coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Chinese scientists expelled Canadian microbiology lab took novel coronavirus strain China .
Explanation: The two scientists at the National Microbiology Lab (Winnipeg, Canada) are suspected to have sent live Ebola and Henipah viruses to Beijing in March 2019, but it has nothing to do with the coronavirus. They were expelled from the lab, but are not considered spies.

What fact-check ?: A CBC news report would said Chinese scientists Canadian lab sent coronavirus Wuhan .
Explanation: Nothing in the CBC report (and 2 subsequent reports) said anything about "spies", or even coronavirus, and no link is done between the expulsion of these two scientists in July 2019 and the virus.

What fact-check ?: Authorities identified international chemical-warfare terrorist ‘ Samuel Whitcomb Hyde ’ behind deadly China ‘ coronavirus . ' ”
Explanation: It's a long-running internet hoax. Sam Hyde is a comedian who is the frequent target of such hoaxes

What fact-check ?: DailyMail reported virus leaked Wuhan National Biosafety Laboratory responsible pandemic .
Explanation: The DailyMail article didn’t report that. Rutgers University microbiologist Dr Richard Ebright told DailyMail that "at this point there’s no reason to harbour suspicions" that the facility had anything to do with the outbreak, besides being responsible for the crucial genome sequencing that lets doctors diagnose it.

What fact-check ?: A spray could protect coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: The product being hawked by the Genesis Church 2 is essentially bleach.

What fact-check ?: A tabletop exercise using model current outbreak `` predicted '' 65 million people could die coronavirus .
Explanation: There was no prediction made at the tabletop exercise. It was held in October of 2019 and used a different model of the coronavirus, and no predicted death toll was estimated by the groups.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus originated laboratory linked China 's biowarfare program .
Explanation: There is no evidence that the coronavirus 2019-nCoV was born in a China laboratory.

What fact-check ?: A French member parliament , Dominique Da Silva , said hopes coronavirus kill people older 70 .
Explanation: The deputy's speech was meant to be satire, but it was misleading and shocked some people.

What fact-check ?: The SARS-CoV-2 created 2003 United States .
Explanation: The patent that some people shared isn't related to the SARS-Cov-2 but to another coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: This video shows Wuhan market virus comes .
Explanation: It's a market in Indonesia.

What fact-check ?: Queensland issued travel warning Wuhan Chinese-populated areas Australia .
Explanation: Queensland said they did not.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus type rabies .
Explanation: Authorities say it's a hoax, the two viruses are different.

What fact-check ?: First infected Almaty ( Kazakhstan ) .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Indian nurse Jeddah ( Saudi Arabia ) detected novel coronavirus ( 2019-nCOV ) .
Explanation: Official Goverment handles have clarified that The Indian Nurse is not suffering from the deadly 2019-Ncov.

What fact-check ?: A screenshot text message spread Facebook claimed Chinese patient Hi-Precision Diagnostics clinic Alabang , Philippines , tested positive novel coronavirus 2019 nCoV .
Explanation: In a press briefing on Tuesday, January 28, the Department of Health (DOH) announced that there was still no confirmed case of 2019 nCoV in the country. The patient at Asian Hospital and Medical Center in Alabang, Muntinlupa City is among the 24 persons under investigation (PUIs) for the possible 2019 nCoV infection.

What fact-check ?: The 2019 novel coronavirus ( nCoV ) `` type rabies '' contracted eating bats .
Explanation: In a press briefing on Tuesday, January 28, Health Secretary Francisco Duque III clarified that the 2019 nCoV belongs to the Coronaviridae family of viruses. Meanwhile, rabies is from Rhabdoviridae.

What fact-check ?: `` Wuhan Virus '' named SARI . Steroid medicine cure . Acetic acid used prevent .
Explanation: 1."Wuhan Virus" is named as "2019n-Cov".2.Steroid is not used for curing it. 3. Spraying acetic acid in air can not help prevent it.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus dies 56°C , eat cooked food turn AC . Plus , Ethanol kill `` Wuhan Virus '' .
Explanation: Turning on the heater can not kill coronavirus. Both alcohol and chlorine can be useful to disinfect surfaces, but they can not cure COVID-19 and need to be used under appropriate recommendations.

What fact-check ?: Chinese doctor Zhong Nanshan adviced rinse mouth salty water prevent 2019n-Cov .
Explanation: Nan-shan Zhong hasn't had such a comment. There is no evidence that rinsing the mouth with slaty water can prevent COVID-19, either.

What fact-check ?: The roll-out 5G causing coronavirus coronavirus-like symptoms .
Explanation: The effect of 5G on the public's health is a long-standing cause of concern, also in the Dutch language area on local facebook groups such as 5G-plein. At the end of January coronavirus has started to be mentioned in these groups as a by-product of the roll-out of 5G (cf. Thomas Cowan's youtube video). There is no proof for this.

What fact-check ?: The director major hospital São Paulo , Brazil , recommended drinking fennel tea eating bull 's liver ways prevention covid-19 .
Explanation: The recommendations made on the text do not follow WHO's pattern and include a false information about the medecine Tamiflu. Furthermore, the hospital said its board of directors didn't do any alert of the kind.

What fact-check ?: A Saudi Arabian study MERS vaccine linked outbreak coronavirus .
Explanation: Based on the evidence, AAP FactCheck found the Facebook post to be false. The Saudi clinical trial is investigating a vaccine for the MERS coronavirus strain, not the 2019 Novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Post claims food products rice , fortune cookies , mi goreng noodles , ice tea `` Chinese red bull '' contaminated coronavirus Australia . Also areas Sydney supposedly identified contaminated .
Explanation: AAP FactCheck found the Facebook post to be false. A viral infectious diseases expert says there is no evidence of food being a source of any coronavirus transmission. The Facebook post also lists information from the “Department of Diseasology Parramatta” conducting tests showing “positive readings” for the virus at train stations in four Sydney suburbs. NSW Health confirmed to AAP FactCheck there is no such organisation as the “Department of Diseasology Parramatta” and there have been no “positive readings” at train stations.

What fact-check ?: There several new confirmed cases several French cities .
Explanation: Hospitals and authorities denied such claims in various cities.

What fact-check ?: Food locations contaminated Australia .
Explanation: Authorities denied those claims.

What fact-check ?: This woman Malaysia died coronavirus .
Explanation: Family says no evidence of Cov.

What fact-check ?: Water used islamic ablution ritual kill novel coronavirus .
Explanation: Health experts warn that water alone cannot kill the virus and recommend that people wash their hands with soap and water for effective protection.

What fact-check ?: `` Coronavirus China : 30 million quarantined , 2.8 million infected ; 112,000 dead ! People falling streets trains ! Supermarkets without food ! ''
Explanation: "No official source has confirmed these numbers. There were 81 dead and 2,840 cases confirmed until January 27th. Hal Turner never worked at the FBI. He was only an informer".

What fact-check ?: Raúl Rodolfo Abhduz Khan , biochemical engineer Karmalah Laboratories , creator novel coronavirus .
Explanation: The person in the image is a YouTuber from Spain named Raúl Álvarez, aka AuronPlay. His image is commonly used to create disinformation, i.e. he was blamed for the fire in Notredame and in the Amazonas. The image is manipulated in order to show that is a news from CNN en Español.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus spreads Ecuadorian cities ( Quito - Guayaquil ) .
Explanation: The Ministry of Public Health analyzes a suspicious case. There is no confirmation about the presence of the virus in Ecuador.

What fact-check ?: The Health Authority confirmed 3 cases coronavirus country .
Explanation: There were no confirmed cases at that time.

What fact-check ?: Videos people infected coronavirus China .
Explanation: In both cases, it can't corroborate the origin of the material. Besides, does not exist an official pronouncement of any Chinese authority in health matter.

What fact-check ?: The Indian health department issued notification advising people drink 50-80ml water , avoid spicy food , travel crowded spaces till March 2020 .
Explanation: There has been no notification suggesting drinking only a certain amount of water, avoiding spicy food and improving the intake of vitamin C prevent coronavirus. The children are more vulnerable theory is also not scientifically backed. At the time of the story, there were no confirmed cases in India and the death toll had reached 106 in China.

What fact-check ?: New strain virus already patented ; Bill Gates funds institute holds patent ; Bill Gates predicted outbreak 65 Million Deaths .
Explanation: There are many patents for coronaviruses, but those are for different strains, not the one that recently broke out in China. Bill Gates has not predicted the outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Everything much worse reported ; current virus worse SARS ; causes red rashes skin , media reporting enough ; people falling virus streets .
Explanation: The video is spreading unproven, misleading and partly false claims about the outbreak of the new coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: A seafood market source novel coronavirus , strange animals foods sold , batsoup snakes .
Explanation: It is possible that animals transmitted the virus to people. Many of the first patiens had visited the market. However, a direct link has not yet been proven.

What fact-check ?: 156 thousand people died China due coronavirus , 90 thousands Wuhan .
Explanation: Article was based on Russian YouTube video, which was based on another article written by infamous conspiracy fake-news website. Figures had no reliable source of information.

What fact-check ?: According news report , doctor Wuhan hospital seen collapsing later lost life result infected coronavirus 2019-nCoV front patients hospital staff .
Who said/posted it?: Posts found on social media and news websites
Explanation: "The incident which was captured in the video in question was a violent attack in the public hospital at the city of Quzhou, at the Hejing county in China. The doctor and two of his collegues were injured by the relative of a patient who lost his life after an acute myocardial infarction."

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus killed 112,000 people China .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus may originated lab linked China 's biowarfare program .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: “ CORONAVIRUS : Reports 10,000 DEAD Wuhan , China . ''
Explanation: As of early Jan. 27, the estimated death toll is 81 — all of them in China.

What fact-check ?: A “ Chinese spy team ” working Canadian government lab sent “ pathogens Wuhan facility ” prior coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: Eric Morrissette, a spokesman for the Public Health Agency of Canada, told us by email, “this is misinformation and there is no factual basis for claims being made on social media.”

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus effect person 's lips .
Explanation: The video shared a effectof Coronovirus on a patient lip is found to be on the internet at least since November-2019 i.e. before the recent epidemic broke out. So, it is not related to the recent coronavirus epidemic.

What fact-check ?: BIll Gates contributed spread coronavirus .
Explanation: The work that Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation does on healthcare has in no way contributed to the spread of coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Another video shows woman eating bat soup Wuhan .
Who said/posted it?: Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram users, anonymous
Explanation: We tracked the girl's social media accounts, confirmed they were authentic. She claims the video was taken over the summer but wouldn't tell were. The set up and meal look like Palau traditionnal bat soup but we couldn't confirm.

What fact-check ?: Close-up bat soup bowl eaten Wuhan , elsewhere China .
Who said/posted it?: Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram users, anonymous
Explanation: A local source in Palau said he recognized a specific local restaurant. Table, room setting and plates' decorations match with other pictures found online showing tourist dining in unspecified restaurant in Palau. Not enough elements for us to call it false but pretty close.

What fact-check ?: This video shows woman eating bat soup Wuhan .
Explanation: Video shot in Palau in 2016.

What fact-check ?: This video shows man eating bat soup restaurant China .
Explanation: With identified many elements in the video that matched pictures published by Chinese bloggers who visited Palau and documented their trip.

What fact-check ?: Filipinos eating bat soup Wuhan .
Explanation: YouTubers made the video last July in Palau.

What fact-check ?: Bat market bat meat sold Wuhan .
Explanation: Video taken in Indonesia (Manado)

What fact-check ?: Video Wuhan market dogs , snakes , rats bats ...
Explanation: Video taken in Indonesia (Langowan)

What fact-check ?: A package AliExpress sent China spread new coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: Multiple Twitter accounts + Messages on franceinfo.fr news feed
Explanation: The coronavirus need a living host to grow. This kind of virus lives only a few days in a liquid and only a few hours on an object. The virus would die during the long transport from China to France, for example. The scientist never observed this king of contamination before with any kind of coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus created patented American lab two years pandemic .
Explanation: These pre-existing patents are referring to other viruses and coronaviruses.

What fact-check ?: An explosion occured Wuhan , China , tied coronavirus outbreak .
Who said/posted it?: Ricky DJ Moore II on YouTube
Explanation: It was a video supposedly of an explosion in Wuhan, China. A search showed it was actually footage of the first of several explosions in Tianjin, China, from 2015.

What fact-check ?: Spreading coronavirus interest USA , American laboratories operating around Russia surroundings Asian countries Georgia ( Lugar lab ) .
Who said/posted it?: Russian TV Channel Ren TV, Igor Nikulin, military expert and former Georgian Minister of Security Igor Giorgadze (comment made in 2018)
Explanation: There are several conspiracy narratives developed in the report, including on US Labs artificially linked to the coronavirus. In the context of conspiracy narrative, the story author names Tbilisi-based Lugar Laboratory of biological research, making an unreasonable parallel between virus found in China and Tbilisi Laboratory. Moreover, the story features the archive material from 2018, in which former Georgian Minister of Security Igor Giorgadze talks about the threats coming from the Lugar Lab. Lugar Laboratory is a part of the National Center for Disease Control and Public Health of Ministry of Health of Georgia. For years, Lugar Lab has been a target of Kremlin, Russia affiliated media, Russian politicians and high officials. Except for US-financed C Hepatitis Treatment program, there are other conspiracies linked to the lab.

What fact-check ?: Event 201 “ gave stuffed souvenir coronavirus toys ” “ commemorate ” novel coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: Event 201 used a fictionalized coronavirus outbreak as its pandemic scenario but did not "predict" the outbreak of a strain that would be detected two months later in December 2019 in Wuhan, China.

What fact-check ?: `` CORONAVIRUS : Reports 10,000 DEAD Wuhan , China . ''
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: China `` stole coronavirus Canada weaponized Bioweapon . ''
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: The Chinese Communist Party `` finally admit real source coronavirus ‘ lab Wuhan ’ linked covert biological weapon programs . ''
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus slowed stopped “ immediate widespread use high doses vitamin C . ”
Explanation: There’s currently no vaccine or medicine recommended to treat the current coronavirus, and there’s no evidence high doses of vitamin C has any effect.

What fact-check ?: A message saying “ patient tested positive ” 2019 novel coronavirus ( nCoV ) Makati Medical Center circulated messaging apps social media platforms Monday , January 27 .
Explanation: There is still no confirmed case of the 2019 nCoV in the Philippines as of January 28, according to the Department of Health (DOH).

What fact-check ?: Is Corona Virus Really Relating Chinese Treatment Uighur Muslims ?
Explanation: The claim that the emergence of the Corona 2019 virus is related to Chinese treatment of Uighur Muslims is a misleading claim. There is no link at all between the emergence of the coronavirus with how China treats Muslim Uighurs. The spread of the coronavirus has become a global health challenge after the advent of SARS in 2002 and MERS in 2013.

What fact-check ?: A FB user published collage tweets claiming novel coronavirus reached Cebu province Boracay Island , popular tourists destinations .
Explanation: There is no confirmed positive case of the newly-detected 2019 nCoV in the Philippines at this time. This was clarified by Health Secretary Francisco Duque III in a Jan. 27 interview with CNN Philippines. He emphasized this in a separate press conference in Malacanang, where he also reported that the five-year-old boy suspected of having the disease tested negative.

What fact-check ?: In Ukrainian media , written confirmed case Chinese coronavirus strain .
Explanation: We have described that this is not the case and indicated that there are several strains.

What fact-check ?: A post says coronavirus slowed stopped “ immediate widespread use high doses vitamin C . ”
Explanation: The claim was originally shared on an alternative medical website that promotes nutritional supplementation.

What fact-check ?: “ In ‘ Resident Evil ’ Umbrella Corporation releases virus infects people Raccoon City . A biological research lab exact logo Umbrella Corporation found city coronavirus outbreak originated . ”
Explanation: There’s no evidence that the 2019 coronavirus that was first detected in Wuhan was created in a lab. It likely has its origins in bats, according to the CDC.

What fact-check ?: Effects coronavirus affected persons lip .
Explanation: The video shared a effect of Coronovirus on a patient lip is found to be on the internet at least since November-2019 i.e. before the recent epidemic broke out. So, it is not related to the recent coronavirus epidemic.

What fact-check ?: American radio host spreads misinformation number deaths infected coronavirus ; rumors get Brazil .
Explanation: The text on Facebook only quotes Hal Turner's radio show. The american states having worked 15 years on FBI. In fact, Hal Turner never worked on FBI, only as a consultant between 2003 and 2007. Furthermore, his radio show has already spread other fake news checked by american fact-checking agency Lead Stories.

What fact-check ?: An Israeli analyst suggested coronavirus might biological weapon created laboratory .
Explanation: Analyst Dany Shoham told FactCheck.KZ that he was indeed interview by Washington Times, but the website published only a part of his answer. He said there is no evidence that such thing happened.

What fact-check ?: Claim `` Wuhan super virus '' originated Chinese biosecurity lab infected 100,000 Wuhan .
Explanation: There is no evidence that the 2019 Novel coronavirus came from a Chinese laboratory. The WHO says the virus most likely originated in an animal. The number of cases of infection with the coronavirus in Wuhan has not reached 100,000 as claimed in the video.

What fact-check ?: Keeping throat moist drinking water prevents contamination .
Explanation: It's not part of official health recommandations.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus patient bites doctor 's jugular USA .
Who said/posted it?: multiple accounts on Facebook and Twitter
Explanation: The screenshot was doctored. O Globo never published the story, URL directs to a non-related story, URL was shortened with a t.co domain, whereas O Globo uses glo.bo in their tweets.

What fact-check ?: 10,000 people died coronavirus Wuhan .
Explanation: WHO data listed only 170 deaths in China at the time of publishing

What fact-check ?: This video showing market animals claimed shot Wuhan .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article.

What fact-check ?: Video shows larva extracted person 's lip related coronavirus .
Explanation: The viral video has no relation to coronavirus as it is an old video which can be traced back to October 2019.

What fact-check ?: Avoid ice-creams , cold drinks , sweets 90 days prevent coronavirus .
Explanation: No scientific backing to say that the virus spreads through food items like ice creams and cold drinks. The virus has not even emerged in India.

What fact-check ?: New coronavirus information `` 15 % fatality rate , 83 % infection rate '' `` worst human history '' .
Explanation: According to Ministry of Health, this information is absolutely false.

What fact-check ?: There alert coronavirus Madrid , Barcelona Valencia ( January 28 ) .
Explanation: There are no cases of coronavirus detected in Spain.

What fact-check ?: China earned 20 billion dollars coronavirus .
Explanation: Zombie-fake. For the first time, such a text with a sum of 20 billion and a link (inactive) to the website Faktxeber appeared in 2014 after the annexation of the Crimea, and it featured not China and the leader of the Chinese Communist party, but Russia and Vladimir Putin. As for the Chinese stock markets, they are generally closed until February 3 and transactions are not conducted there.

What fact-check ?: “ BILL AND MELINDA GATES FOUNDATION & OTHERS PREDICTED UP TO 65 MILLION DEATHS VIA CORONAVIRUS — IN SIMULATION RAN 3 MONTHS AGO ! ”
Explanation: InfoWars distorted the facts about an emergency preparedness exercise for a fictional pandemic exercise.

What fact-check ?: 4 people died Hyderabad ( India ) due coronavirus .
Explanation: No cases of coronavirus have been reported in India at this time.

What fact-check ?: KNUST students discover vaccine coronavirus cure patient Cote d'Ivoire .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus spread via bananas
Who said/posted it?: facebookpage “Georgia first of all” & Russian aggregator website Pikabu.ru
Explanation: Coronavirus has transmitted from living organisms - animals - and any evidence, as if bananas or other food products transmit it, has not yet been revealed. Moreover, bananas have been a source of various conspiracies for years, and was considered to be a source of spreading the Ebola, then AIDS and swine flu groundlessly and without any scientific justification. 'Myth Detector's developed banana 'timeline' reflecting the conspiracies that were inspired by a banana and banana-caused viruses at different times.

What fact-check ?: A video gone viral social media claims feature one victims deadly virus .
Explanation: The same video was posted YouTube on October 24th, 2019, which was before the first case of coronavirus got reported in China in December 2019.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus China : 2.8 million infected 112,000 dead .
Explanation: It's not true that in Cina there are 2.8 million people infected and 112,000 dead.

What fact-check ?: This video connected coronavirus shows wholesale market China low–hygiene environment .
Explanation: The video is highly misleading: the market is located in Indonesia and not in China.

What fact-check ?: Says drinking bleach solution prevent getting coronavirus .
Explanation: Officials have repeteadly warned consumers against injesting it, saying doing so could cause severe vomiting and liver failure.

What fact-check ?: Says `` Clorox bottle claimed could kill ( 2019 coronavirus ) ... developed . ''
Explanation: There is no evidence that the 2019 coronavirus was "developed" prior to the outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Can garlic cure patients infected coronavirus ?
Explanation: There has been no research or evidence that garlic can cure patients infected with the coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Grape vinegar antidote coronavirus .
Explanation: There is no scientific evidence the benefits of vinegat to fight with the disease. The virus is not poison, an antidote would not be useful at all.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus firstly appeared June 2019 .
Explanation: The virus was detected in Wuhan, China in late December, not in June 2019 according to Lancet paper, WHO and other sources.

What fact-check ?: The studies initiated `` Military Research Institute '' transformed form virus 2018 .
Explanation: The claim that the virus was developed by a "military institute" is based on an article authored by Dan Hu, who works for Third Military Medical University in China. However, the article does not mention the experiments changed the genetics of the virus. Again, the examples used in the article are stored in the gene bank with a code and these codes are also included in the study. This allows scientists to work on the virus.

What fact-check ?: The animals list photo served meeting 40 thousand people China , virus spread day .
Explanation: The animal list, which presented with the prices in the photo, belongs to the list of animals sold in live animal markets in China. And there is no information regarding a meeting of 40 thousand people in this city.

What fact-check ?: Turkish doctor allegedly found coronavirus vaccine .
Explanation: There is no doctor called "Tamer Yirmiüçoğlu." The doctor in the photo is gynecologist Op. Dr. Tamer Gültekin who became famous in 2016 with the vagina bleaching operations.

What fact-check ?: YouTube channel published radio-show-style report false headline saying novel coronavirus Philippines
Explanation: Kabisnes’s false and clickbait headline does not reflect its content. In the video’s first 10 seconds, the show host reads the phrase “Coronavirus, nasa Pilipinas na (coronavirus, already in the Philippines)” then proceeds to say that it was a claim circulating on social media, currently being debunked by Malacanang and DOH.

What fact-check ?: A FB post giving information safety precautions coronaviruses misleading readers falsely claiming premise positive case 2019 novel coronavirus “ confirmed ” found Cebu province .
Explanation: The Department of Health announced on Jan. 28 there remains to be no positive case of the 2019 nCoV in the country, only that there are 27 people under investigation for suspected infection.

What fact-check ?: The video shown shows effects coronavirus avoid ice cream , cold drinks 90 days .
Explanation: Video shown in the viral post showing a person removing larvae from the lips using a pair of tweezers is old and unrelated to coronavirus. The claim in the viral post is also refuted by medical professionals.

What fact-check ?: The novel coronavirus ( 2019-nCoV ) `` last long '' Philippines warm climate .
Explanation: The World Health Organization (WHO) has not said that temperature affects the spread of 2019-nCoV and they don't recommend exposure to heat as protection or a treatment for the virus.

What fact-check ?: Two Filipinos ate bat soup Wuhan , China , epicenter 2019 novel coronavirus ( nCoV ) , seen video uploaded Facebook .
Explanation: The original video was taken in Palau and was uploaded on YouTube on July 17, 2019 – at least 5 months before a case of the 2019-nCoV was first reported in Wuhan, China.

What fact-check ?: The following statement Wuhan nurse : Don ’ go , ’ go parties , ’ eat , 98.000 infected 2.700 , sensationaly transmitted Macedonian media outlet Republika .
Explanation: On 28 January 2020 official figures as of day before were about 4,500 infected in China, not 2,700. Official figures are published by Johns Hopkins University, which has no connection to the Chinese government propaganda and is trying to objectively monitor the outbreak of the new coronavirus. A relevant source for an epidemic situation is always a health institution or operational headquarters to fight the epidemic, not an individual.

What fact-check ?: America Predicted The Outbreak coronavirus 9 Years Ago .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: America predicts COVID-19 9 years ago, and the proof is the movie "Contingent." This news is fake because of the clear difference between talking about intersections between the film's story and the spread of COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: News The death Two Girls Infected With coronavirus In Northern Syria ?
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: An official source denied news that COVID-19 had arrived in Syria and had killed two girls in Aleppo countryside.

What fact-check ?: Video footage dead animals dogs , rats , bats snakes sold market Wuhan .
Explanation: The recording was shot in Langowan, Indonesia, not in Wuhan.

What fact-check ?: Person infected coronavirus bit doctor 's jugular .
Explanation: The fake news was a reproduction of a Twitter post allegedly from brazilian media outlet O Globo. In fact, the news media did not post no news of that kind.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus made lab , preexisting patents vaccine . The Bill Melinda Gates foundation involved spreading coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: Ugnius Kiguolis, local antivaxer, a businessman

What fact-check ?: This picture first new Wuhan coronavirus hospital .

What fact-check ?: WHO advises population avoid unprotected sex animals .
Who said/posted it?: Facebook personal profilles and WhatsApp groups
Explanation: Posts presented an edited version of an image posted by WHO on Twitter in January 27. In the original publication, the organization advised people to avoid contact with wild and farm animals.

What fact-check ?: Doctors recommend vitamin C fennel seed tea help avoid novel coronavirus .
Explanation: There is no scientific evidence to support the claim that vitamin C or fennel seed tea are effective in the treatment or prevention of the novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Vitamin C Zinc prevent treat coronavirus infection .
Explanation: According to WHO, there is still no remedy to treat the 2019-nCoV virus and preventive measures include washing your hands frequently and avoiding contact with infected people, not taking vitamin C with zinc.

What fact-check ?: Government India recommends homeopathy alternate medicines preventing coronavirus .
Explanation: THe World Health Organization has stated that there are no proved preventions and treatments for this virus. The mechanisms mentioned by the AYUSH ministry are not scientifically proved to help in tackling coronaviruses.

What fact-check ?: A Facebook video claiming seafood market place Wuhan market China .
Explanation: This video is of the Langowan market in Indonesia and not of the Wuhan seafood market.

What fact-check ?: Video girl dying coronavirus shopping mall .
Explanation: The video is from Malaysia where the girl died due to a heart failure and not Coronvirus. BOOM corroborated the theory with a family member of the deceased

What fact-check ?: Chinese people rush Japan abuse Japanese health insurance system .

What fact-check ?: A tweet entitled `` Risk novel coronavirus countermeasures '' saying `` The virus stays alive 48 hours . '' `` The clothes need disinfected alcohol goggles prevent corneal infection . '' `` Die without fever . ''
Explanation: Acording to the Virology Expert; Inactivation will not take 48 hours. No cases have been reported of death without fever. It is difficult to completely disinfect outerwear with alcohol. Goggles are not generally needed. Not an artificial virus.

What fact-check ?: The first patient diagnosed COVID-19 dead .
Explanation: The patient was still alive.

What fact-check ?: Emergency nofication issued Health Ministry coronavirus recommendations

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus killed 10.000 people Wuhan .

Explanation: The Chinese company RLSW is engaged in genetic testing and advanced scientific research. However, the address on Google Maps could not be corroborated and the official site does not offer much information.

What fact-check ?: On ocassion coronavirus , posts social media ensure pandemics 20 's several centuries .
Explanation: The information in the post are innacurate because de pandemics mentioned in the posts ocurred years before of years after the 20's of those centuries.

What fact-check ?: MMS effective preventing eradicating coronavirus .
Explanation: There is still no cure for COVID-19, and health authorities have warned that MMS is dangerous to health.

What fact-check ?: Patient biten doctor USA .

What fact-check ?: The article includes compilation different false claims manipulative photos : 1 ) false claim saying identified infected person Georgia , 2 ) false claim banana source spread coronavirus , 3 ) false claim saying chinese passengers getting fever medication , 4 ) false claim Georgian doctors refusing screen passengers coronavirus airport
Who said/posted it?: Facebook page "daily developments", online news website "alia.ge", clickbait site "ambavi.cc", news-front - Russian funded news agency,

What fact-check ?: Video girl dying coronavirus .
Explanation: The girl in the video has not died due to coronavirus. The family of the girl and the Malaysian Health Ministry have confirmed that the rumours about the girl’s death are FALSE.

Explanation: The video was taken at an animal market in Langowan (Indonesia). It is not related to Wuhan (China).

What fact-check ?: Statistics predicting millions dead people billions infected people days .
Explanation: There is no modelization of the virus yet. So it's impossible to predict anything about the epidemic.

What fact-check ?: `` Japan sent many masks Wuhan , China . But China ’ supported Japan ever . ''
Explanation: China sent their rescue team and many goods at Great East Japan earthquake (2011), donated a lot of money to Japan at the 2016 Kumamoto Earthquake, and the Heavy Rain of July, 2018.

What fact-check ?: A team @ WorldPopProject heat mapped highest risk counties # Wuhancoronavirus . `` Japan second highest country Abe administration ’ emforce immigration restrictions . ''
Explanation: The ranking is based on Lunar New Year travel prior to the holiday in 2018. This report does not refer to any countries immigration restrictions in this year. Japan has the second highest risk country but it's not related to the immigration policy.

What fact-check ?: The Korean Government pay travellers ' medical expense coronavirus without basis law .
Explanation: According to IHR 2005, government is responsible for paying medical treatment expense to travellers. Accordingly, related Act also defines it.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus Des Moines .
Explanation: The story came from a prank website where it got over 9000 Facebook engagements

What fact-check ?: Scripps urgent care San Diego lockdown , two people coronavirus isolated .
Explanation: Scripps denied it was true through their Twitter account, there was one person with the flu but no coronavirus.

Countries: Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia, Croatia, Montenegro
What fact-check ?: China constructed hospital coronavirus 48 hours .
Who said/posted it?: Mainstream website 24sata.hr , then 20+ media in the region
Explanation: The building has been in construction since 2018. What China has done is accomodate the building with 1.000 beds for coronavirus patients.

What fact-check ?: A person died hematemesis Beitou . He diagnosed 2019n-Cov . Wear mask Taipei .
Explanation: There was no death case in Taiwan (1/28/2020).

What fact-check ?: Chinese panic video Corona Virus .

What fact-check ?: Prevent coronavirus drinking warm water .
Explanation: The message did not come from the Indonesian Ministry of Health. And there is no research that supports that drinking warm water can prevent transmission of the virus.

What fact-check ?: Death toll Wuhan due coronavirus reaches 10 thousand people ?
Explanation: Death toll from the 2019-nCoV virus in China reached 132 people at the time of publication.

What fact-check ?: 25 million infected 40 thousand died coronavirus epidemic .
Explanation: The figures in the claim can't be found in any official announcement.

What fact-check ?: The virus entirely different known virus forms . It activates bacterias viruses human body .
Explanation: The nCOV virus is genetically related with the other coronaviruses detected before. All infections can activate other infections in humans. In this epidemic only four case reported as secondary infections.

What fact-check ?: The Simpsons predicted epidemic advance .
Explanation: Osaka flu came from Japan in the related Simpsons episode with a package, not from China.

What fact-check ?: The movie Venom predicted epidemic advance .
Explanation: The movie is not based on an epidemic at all. The character is not infected after eating snake in a marketplace and attack people.

What fact-check ?: The photograph ( shows people floor ) shows impact coronavirus China .
Explanation: The claim along with the photo is false and it is in no way related to the outbreak of coronavirus. It is actually an old photo from Germany dated to 2014. Moreover, the people in the photo are not dead, but were lying down on the road as part of an art project.

What fact-check ?: There `` positive '' case novel coronavirus ( nCoV ) hospital Banlic , Cabuyao City , Laguna , Philippines January 2020 .
Explanation: There was no coronavirus case at the Global Medical Center of Laguna around the time the claim was spread.

What fact-check ?: Bill Gates predicted simulated COVID-19 pandemic .
Explanation: Bill Gates' foundation worked on the possibility that a coronavirus could spread and be responsible of a pandemia. It can't be taken as a prediction because mutiplie coronavirus have been known for decades. It didn't foresee the current pandemia.

What fact-check ?: Is proven bats snakes responsible spread SARS-CoV-2 ?
Explanation: This theory is far from proven, it should still be taken with caution.

What fact-check ?: Image Shows People Falling On The Streets Wuhan .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Upon verification, Misbar found that the image was from 2014.

What fact-check ?: Authors tabletop exercise Oct 2019 predicted Wuhan coronavirus might kill 65 million people .

What fact-check ?: People lying street China CoV .
Explanation: It was an artictic performance in 2014 in Germany.

What fact-check ?: Video Wuhan market new coronavirus started spread .

What fact-check ?: Photo several people lying ground middle street , allegedly China .
Explanation: Photo from Frankfurt, Germany, 2014.

What fact-check ?: The Canadian Department Health issued emergency notification reccomending people keep throats moist protect novel coronavirus .
Explanation: The bulletin is false and there is no scientific evidence that shows that drinking water prevents against coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: 4600 Chinese people arrived Hakata Port Japan .
Explanation: According to Hakata-city, this information is misleading.

What fact-check ?: `` Tokyo Olympic Games 2020 canceled coronavirus . ''
Explanation: According to The Tokyo Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games, this information is false.

What fact-check ?: In Japan , `` It ’ Democratic party 's fault health insurance system abused foreigners ''
Explanation: Accoring to Japan Tourism Agency, this information is false.

What fact-check ?: Chinese pet owners killing cats dogs throwing window , fear pets spreading coronavirus . This comes memos issued authorities pet owners get rid animals .
Explanation: The pet killings happened withtin the context of the Chinese local authorities issuing REAL memos that ordered citizens to get rid of their pets and the dissemination of the misinformation about the transmission of the coronavirus 2019-nCoV, but we cannot affirm that the motivation of the owners of the animals has been related to the disease outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Video woman eating bat soup relation coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: There is yet no confirmation regarding the exact cause of the outbreak. Also, the video was filmed in Palau in 2016, so there is no relation with the current coronavirus in China.

What fact-check ?: Video plate bat soup allegedly started coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: There is yet no confirmation regarding the exact cause of the outbreak, although some scientists agree that bats can be (and have been in other ocasions) carriers of coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: `` Five foods help get coronavirus ''

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus killed 10.000 people
Explanation: The latest report from the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control says there are currently 170 people who died.

What fact-check ?: The biological research laboratory Ruilan Bao Hu San Biotech Limited Shanghai , city # coronarvirus originated , logo like Umbrella Corporation RESIDENT EVIL corona anagram Racoon . WTF
Explanation: There are no proves of the relation between the Chinesse company RLSW and coronavirus, neigther that Shanghai is the place where it all started. Moreover the anagram of the word "corona" is not the same as Raccoon, the name of the city where takes place the videogame Resident Evil.

What fact-check ?: Chain message notification Spaniard department Health .
Explanation: The Spanish heatlh department did not issue that notification.

What fact-check ?: WHO advises avoid `` unprotected sex '' animals .
Explanation: It is a manipulated imagen, WHO confirmed.

What fact-check ?: Video doctor fainted floor getting infected coronavirus .
Explanation: The doctor was in the floor because the familiy of the patient punched him after he was not able to save him after he had a heart attack.

What fact-check ?: What 's virus 5G causing disease deaths ?
Explanation: The deaths from COVID-19 had nothing to do with 5G.

What fact-check ?: Gates Foundation funded development coronavirus .
Explanation: Article was based on manipulative connection of facts concerning the Gates Foundation and Pirbright Institute which resulted in misleading context and ultimately, disinformative article.

What fact-check ?: The Canadian Ministry Health issued press release states taking security measures combat coronavirus 2019-nCoV .

Explanation: "The Canadian Health Ministry didn't issues such a statement and the security measures mentioned are incorrect."

What fact-check ?: We Q & A facts coronavirus .
Explanation: Q&A on the facts about the coronavirus

What fact-check ?: Manir Hossain , 23-year-old man India ’ Tripura , died hospital Malaysia due coronavirus .
Explanation: Upon our investigation, we found the above news reports to be False. An Indian citizen from Tripura did not die due to coronavirus in Malaysia. The reason for his death is Status Epilepticus Secondary Meningoencephalitis.

What fact-check ?: Mélange Of Unrelated Videos From China Shared Misleadingly In Context To Recent Corona Virus Outbreak .
Explanation: A mix of different unrelated videos from China have been merged to create this misleading video shared in context to coronavirus. People infected by coronavirus 2019-nCoV, do not exhibit the symptoms such as howling like dogs and biting as shown in the video.

What fact-check ?: Two ways wearing surgical mask : Colored side sick white side want become sick .
Explanation: There is only one way of wearing a three-layered surgical mask. The colored side of the surgical mask should face outwards.

What fact-check ?: `` Some Japanese people infected novel coronavirus refused charter flight Wuhan Tokyo ( Jan.30 ) without Japanese legal basis . ''
Explanation: It is true that two Japanese people who may have been infected could not take a charter flight. They were not permitted to go through the Chinese immigration office because they were stuck at the quarantine station by Chinese medical staff. Japan didn't refuse them.

What fact-check ?: All soldiers South Korea go leave novel coronavirus ( 2019-nCoV ) outbreak .
Explanation: South Korea's ministry of national defense said, "The restrictions on all soldiers are not true at all. However, we only partially limited the area where there were confirmed cases."

What fact-check ?: According certain document , infected cases areas South Korea , Korean government hiding cases .
Explanation: The documents are confirmed as crafted documents. These case are under investigation by Korean police.

What fact-check ?: The Chinese government announced official document `` Garlic preventive food Novel coronavirus . ''
Explanation: The official document is not from China's central government. It's from Shanghai city government. On this original document, there is no mention about garlic or preventive food.

What fact-check ?: Novel coronavirus commuicated package imported goods shipping China Korea .
Explanation: Currently there is no evidence to support transmission of novel coronavirus by imported goods. Also there have not been such cases in Korea.

What fact-check ?: Romania developed coronavirus vaccine able cure white people .
Explanation: There is no known cure for the coronavirus. This is a hoax.

What fact-check ?: A Parasite Removal Video Shared In Relation With coronavirus
Explanation: The video was uploaded on YouTube on October 24, 2019 with the title “Amazing Botfly Removal on Lips”.

What fact-check ?: A video girl shared social media collapsed store claims made affected coronavirus .
Explanation: Incident is from Malaysia and the girl has been identified as Nur Izzah Izzati. Malaysia’s Health Ministry also confirmed that the claim attached with the video is fake.

What fact-check ?: “ Cocaine kills coronavirus , scientists shocked discover drug fight virus . ”
Explanation: This “breaking news” image is from an online news generator and not based on any real news coverage.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus appears Balkan region .
Explanation: A Serbian citizen has indeed been quarantined because suspicion of being infected with the 2019-nCoV virus, but he is quarantined in India, not in Serbia.

What fact-check ?: Simpsons predicted coronavirus .
Explanation: Simsons did not predicted coronavirus, the episod was talkin about "osaka flu". Image was also photoshoped.

What fact-check ?: Video Wuhan market new coronavirus started spread .
Who said/posted it?: Facebook page, then a mainstream media outlet, and then 40+ media in the Balkan region
Explanation: Video is not from China, but from Indonesia.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus hits 15 % fatality rate .
Explanation: The 15% fatality rate from coronavirus (2019-nCoV) applied only to the initial cluster of 41 patients with confirmed infection and severe symptoms, as reported in The Lancet. coronavirus infections can also produce mild symptoms, which likely went undetected. The mortality rate based on a group of more than 800 patients with laboratory-confirmed infection suggests that the fatality rate is closer to 3%.

What fact-check ?: A confirmed case dead hospital Taiwan . His body burned 1/26 .
Explanation: As to Jan. 30., the alleged hospital didn't have a novel coronavirus confirmed case, according to the health authority as well as the hospital.

What fact-check ?: Strong garlic soup cure `` Wuhan Virus '' .
Explanation: There is no evidence that garlic soup cures new coronavirus (COVID-19). To date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Do n't wear clothes fur collar fleece material . It easy contaminated `` Wuhan Virus '' .
Explanation: There is no scientific evidence.

What fact-check ?: Bats hidden every households ' rooftop Wuhan .
Explanation: The film was filmed in Indonesia, not Wuhan.

What fact-check ?: Wuhan Corona Virus crosses Bat Virus Pig Virus ?
Explanation: The current analysis indicate that there is no pig element in the virus. The Wuhan coronavirus originated mostly from SARS and bats, not from pigs.

What fact-check ?: The video claimed Wuhan market , China
Explanation: The wildlife market in the video is not the Wuhan Market in China, but the Langowan Market in Indonesia.

What fact-check ?: China constructed hospital epidemic 48 hours .
Explanation: The construction started in 2018 and it can be seen on Baidu maps.

What fact-check ?: A coronavirus case diagnosed Atasehir hospital , Istanbul
Explanation: The announcement was put on the entrance of the emercency service just in case. But the Facebook post indicates the diagnosis. There is no diagnosed case at this date in Turkey.

What fact-check ?: A bowl freshly boiled garlic water cure novel coronavirus ( 2019-nCoV ) , according chain message spread Facebook .
Link to the original piece: One of the pages that posted on FB: https://www.facebook.com/108286960540024/photos/a.130428328325887/183200309715355/?type=3
Explanation: The World Health Organization (WHO) said that while eating garlic is healthy, it is not proven to protect humans against 2019-nCoV.

What fact-check ?: Philippines ' `` local mainstream media '' n't report novel coronavirus ( 2019-nCoV ) low mortality rate .
Explanation: The media has reported on the low fatality rate of 2019-nCoV.

What fact-check ?: Publication broadcasts video “ market terror coronavirus originated ” .
Explanation: The video was transmitted by most of the Macedonian media, although it is false. The truth is that this video is not of a market in Wuhan, nor anywhere in China, but it is of a market in Indonesia. When you play the video you can see the name of the market in large letters, i.e. Pasar Estream Langowan, and when you search, if you do not know where Langowan is, you will find out that it is in Indonesia, not in China. The falseness of this video was also noted by the AFP FactCheck and Faktly.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 weapon developped chinese lab .
Explanation: The rumors mix false and true information, but give no evidence its claim would be correct.

What fact-check ?: North Korean Leader Will Execute Anyone Who Is Infected With coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Execution of anyone infected with COVID-19 in North Korea. After researching the news, whether in the official North Korean agencies or international news agencies, we have not found a basis for the news source.

What fact-check ?: Penjab autorities advised eat goat meat 60 days .
Explanation: China coronavirus: Pakistani officials deny they issued warning over dangers of eating goat meat.

What fact-check ?: Singapore closed subway stattion case COVID-19 .
Explanation: Authorities denied.

What fact-check ?: Chinese spies stole virus Canadian lab .
Explanation: Mix up with an investigation of Chinese scientist in Canada in 2019.

What fact-check ?: This new hospital Wuhan .
Explanation: This is the Tangiers hospital in Algeria.

What fact-check ?: Fennel tean cure Cov .
Explanation: Doctors are not saying that.

What fact-check ?: Corpses strewn China due coronavirus .
Explanation: The image is from Frankfurt, Germany from 2014 where people lay down in a pedestrian zone as part of an art project in remembrance of the 528 victims of the "Katzback" Nazi concentration camp.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus `` virus weapon '' , lethal Ebola . Everyone infected dies .
Explanation: The Washington Times article does not provide any evidence. According to the CDC, the source of the new coronavirus is currently likely to be wildlife. The mortality rate is currently 2-3%. Most of the dead are elderly people or those with underlying illnesses such as diabetes.

What fact-check ?: Market video ‘ coronavirus began ’ , recorded Wuhan Indonesia .
Explanation: Video taken in Langowan, Indonesia.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus `` arrived '' Cúcuta Colombia .
Who said/posted it?: Luis Guillermo Vélez in his column for La República
Explanation: A column meant to be satirical did not explain this aim and many readers believed that there were confirmed cases of coronavirus in Cúcuta, Colombia's largest city in the border with Venezuela.

What fact-check ?: A dry throat make vulnerable infected coronavirus .
Explanation: Already factchecked by Maldita.es, but they found it said Spain instead of Canada.

What fact-check ?: A huge container soda drinks infected wirh coronavirus .
Explanation: There was no contamination. There is no evidence of coronavirus in the country or of its ability to contaminate soda drinks.

What fact-check ?: The Lysol coronavirus conspiracy : `` 2019-nCoV old already cure ''
Explanation: Although human coronavirus was first discoverd in the 60s, the current 2019-nCoV outbreak was first identified recently.

What fact-check ?: Over 1.500 people died coronavirus
Explanation: As of January 31, the coronavirus death toll is 213.

What fact-check ?: Canadian Department Health issues emergency notification asks people drink warm water .
Explanation: The notification was not issued by the Department of Health of Canada.

What fact-check ?: China builds hospital 48 hours coronavirus patients .
Explanation: The building has been in construction since 2018. What China has done is accomodate the building with 1.000 beds for coronavirus patients

What fact-check ?: Bill Gates funds institute hold patent also predicted outbreak 65 Million Deaths .
Who said/posted it?: Multple websites and social media users
Explanation: The work that Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation does on healthcare has in no way contributed to the spread of coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Facebook user alleged coronavirus unknown kills seconds .
Explanation: The coronavirus is not unknown nor does it kill ‘under a few seconds.’ The WHO says the virus is part of a family of viruses that includes Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV) and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS-CoV). Also, fatality and severity of the disease may be determined by age and other pre-existing health conditions.

What fact-check ?: Facebook page suggests bowl garlic cures `` Wuhan 's '' coronavirus .
Explanation: Health authorities have not recommended any particular drug for coronavirus. So, suggesting an alternative medical practice(s) such as eating a bowl of boiled garlic water is questionable.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus 2019-nCoV patented past human-made , project Bill Melinda Gates foundation involved .
Explanation: "The patent mentioned in the articles in question is about the development of a vaccine for the IBV virus which belongs in a sub-family of the wider category of viruses termed coronaviruses. In short the patent was not for the coronavirus 2019-nCoV."

What fact-check ?: The first building Huoshenshan hospital Wuhan city build 5 days .
Explanation: "The building in the pictures that were circulated in social media is the medical center Dabie Mountain which was restructured in order to respond to the coronavirus patients in a short period of time. It is located in the town Huanggang, 75 kilometers away from Wuham."

What fact-check ?: Doctors reccomend vitamin C fennel seed tea help avoid novel coronavirus .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Video Of An Indonesian Traditional Market Trending Viral As Wuhan , China .
Explanation: an old video from Indonesia shot in July 2019 is being falsely shared as a Market in Wuhan, China which was the origin of the coronavirus. This video has nothing to do with the coronavirus or its place of origin.

What fact-check ?: China builds hospital 48 hours coronavius patients .
Explanation: Our fact check reveals that the newly opened hospital is an extended wing of Huanggang Central Hospital, scheduled to open in May 2020. A dedicated work force made the empty building into a fully operational hospital within two days, which was mistaken as the Huoshenshan Hospital proposed to be constructed in 6 days. Huoshenshan hospital is still under construction and is expected to open to the patients on 3rd day of February.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus enabled 5G technology .
Explanation: There is no scientific proof that coronavirus is in any way linked to 5G.

What fact-check ?: franceinfo hosted chat scientist order answer questions coronavirus , including fake news
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Scientists experts answer questions rumors coronavirus ( bat soup , Wuhan P4 Laboratory , patented virus , people collapsing , etc ) .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus called `` plague '' WHO , 2.9 million infected 950,680 people died
Explanation: A global emergency was declared by WHO. To date, 213 people had died as a result of the coronavirus and another 9,800 cases had been confirmed in mainland China, according to reports, while cases had been discovered in more than a dozen countries worldwide.

What fact-check ?: Video shows market Chinese city Wuhan , deadly coronavirus strain emerged .
Explanation: The video actually shows a market in Indonesia’s Sulawesi island.

What fact-check ?: There link coronavirus 2019-nCoV irregular migration .
Who said/posted it?: Statment made by Matteo Salvini, italian politician and leader of Lega. The statment was published on official Salvini's Facebook, Twitter and Instagram account.
Explanation: There is no direct connection between the spread of Conornavirus 2019-nCoV and the irregular migration in the Mediterranean sea.

What fact-check ?: A team medical trainees JKUAT ( university Kenya ) developed tested vaccine successfully .
Explanation: The university that the students allegedly attended has denied the claim. Additionally, a doctor contacted by PesaCheck has indicated that a vaccine cannot be developed within a month. An Australian lab is in the initial stages of developing a vaccine by recreating the virus.

What fact-check ?: Says `` coronavirus engineered scientists lab . ''

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus contains `` HIV insertions '' .
Explanation: This claim is based on a study which compared extremely short protein sequences between the 2019 novel coronavirus and HIV, a practice likely to give false positives. The study’s authors also overlooked checking for potential similarities between 2019-nCoV and other organisms. As it turned out, these short protein sequences were similar to many other organisms, not just HIV, thereby refuting the claim that 2019-nCoV contains DNA from the HIV virus.

What fact-check ?: Wuhan Virus leaked Wuhan P4 lab .
Explanation: The argument is based on unfounded speculation and quoted from an outdated study.

What fact-check ?: “ You ’ likely die influenza right ” 2019 coronavirus .

Such stories are often republished by unprofessional media not only for ideological but, above all, commercial reasons, because they attract readers’ attention.

What fact-check ?: The Simpsons Predicted coronavirus Since 1993 .

What fact-check ?: A Sri Lankan Girl Finding A Cure For coronavirus .

What fact-check ?: Japan sent 1000-man medical team Wuhan .

What fact-check ?: This image related coronavirus outbreak .

What fact-check ?: The novel coronavirus ( 2019-nCoV ) `` spread '' Philippines due country 's high temperature well relatively high humidity .

What fact-check ?: An Israeli spy ( Dany Shoham ) claims new coronavirus linked Chinese secret program production biological weapons Institute Virology Wuhan , epicenter infection .

Foregn Policy says the Wuhan virus is not a laboratory bio-weapon, stressing that conspiracy theories are spreading faster than the coronavirus itself. The Washington Post has a similar headline, in which experts say that they have debunked the theory linking the emergence of coronavirus in China with the development of biological weapons.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus killed 1,12,000 people infected 28 lakh China .

What fact-check ?: Video bats found tiles many roofs Hubei , China . They source coronavirus .

What fact-check ?: Dettol sanitizer kill coronavirus . The company knew coronavirus back 2019 .
Explanation: The ‘Coronavirus’ mentioned on Dettol bottle is the previous strains of coronavirus, not the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV). Also, Dettol manufacturer (‘RB’) has clarified that they do not yet have more details of the new virus and are not yet in a position to confirm levels of effectiveness against the new strain.

What fact-check ?: Three Misleading Pictures coronavirus Hospitals In China .

What fact-check ?: South Korean presidential Blue House forbids term 'Wuhan pneumonia ' .

What fact-check ?: Boild garlic water protect Cov .

What fact-check ?: Tinospira crispa plants treat cov .
Explanation: Philippine health experts dismiss misleading online claim that tinospora crispa plants can treat novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Case cov Alberta , Canada .
Explanation: Authorities denied it.

What fact-check ?: A case novel coronavirus registered hospital Maranhão .
Explanation: It was a different type of coronavirus, HCoV-OC43, which causes regular colds.

What fact-check ?: This market China bats snakes served food .
Explanation: The market was in Indonesia.

What fact-check ?: Doctors confirm novel coronavirus may arrive Brazil AliExpress packages .
Explanation: There's no evidence for this claim. All specialists agree that it's very unlikely that a virus would survive more than a few hours outside a host, on a solid surface.

What fact-check ?: Indian daily falsely links study coronavirus digital edition changes .
Explanation: The study was linked to filoviruses and had the minimal role of Wuhan's virology institute.

What fact-check ?: Farts recorded infrared temperature sensors recently installed airports train stations monitor temperatures passengers amid coronavirus outbreak screen .
Explanation: The farts were added digitally.

What fact-check ?: Rinsing mouth salted water prevent coronavirus infection .
Explanation: The doctor's team has debunked the chain.

What fact-check ?: First case coronavirus San Vicente del Raspeig ( Alicante , Spain ) .
Explanation: The article was not published by El País and there has been no case detected in Alicante.

What fact-check ?: Spain 's Health Secretary recommends selling products China .
Explanation: The Health Secretary has denied making such recommendations.

What fact-check ?: The Simpsons predicted coronavirus .
Explanation: The episode of The Simpsons talked about a flu from Japan, no China. Moreover, one of the photos shared was manipulated.

What fact-check ?: A picture show people China fainted Street got infected coronavirus
Explanation: The pictures was actually taken in 2014 in Germany during a concentration to remember holocaust victims.

What fact-check ?: Label disinfectant ensures new coronavirus strain new .
Explanation: The disinfectant can only eliminate other types of coronaviruses that are found on hard and non-porous surfaces. But it does not include the new strain 2019-nCoV

What fact-check ?: `` coronavirus epidemy Poland ''
Explanation: Article has clearly misleading, false headline that is an obvious clickbait: "Prime minister has no doubts: coronavirus epidemy in Poland". In the article itself there is no claim or statement said by any of Polish officials that could justify such alarming headline.

What fact-check ?: Fake News Of coronavirus Infecting Boiler Chicken .
Explanation: We found the above circulated post to be False. There is no such confirmation that broiler chicken has been infected by coronavirus, the source of the disease is yet to found. The images in circulated are old and unrelated.

What fact-check ?: Dettol sanitizer kill coronavirus . The company knew coronavirus back 2019 .
Explanation: The ‘Coronavirus’ mentioned on Dettol bottle is the previous strains of coronavirus, not the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV). Also, Dettol manufacturer (‘RB’) has clarified that they do not yet have more details of the new virus and are not yet in a position to confirm levels of effectiveness against the new strain.

What fact-check ?: 2019 novel coronavirus cured one bowl freshly boiled garlic .
Explanation: World Health Organization (WHO) has issued a clarification that garlic may have some antimicrobial properties but there is no evidence that it can protect people from the 2019 novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Videos Pigs buried China due coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: The videos posted are old. They are in no way related to the recent coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Children 8 immune novel coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: Socila Media and some News Agencies
Explanation: Official WHO reports indicate that among infected there have been children as young as 2. Malaysian press have reported that 3 coronavirus cases in Malaysia include a 2-year-old boy. Also Australia's ABC reports: Queensland confirms third coronavirus case as eight-year-old child from Wuhan, China.

What fact-check ?: Health Canada advised keeping throat moist ( drinking water ) help preventing infection .
Explanation: There is no scientific evidence to support this. Health Canada has never suggested this method.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus caused bat soup .
Explanation: There is no evidence that eating bat-soup is the cause of coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Confirmed case coronavirus found Shaheen Bagh , Delhi .
Explanation: There have been three official cases of coronavirus in India so far. The Twitter handle's claim about the coronavirus case in Shaheen Bagh is fake and misleading.

What fact-check ?: Can cow urine cure coronavirus ?
Explanation: In our verification, we found several media reports, research reports, and advisories that talk about prevention and cure of the disease but there was no mention of cow urine and dung in these reports hence the claim made by the Hindu Mahasabha president Swami Chakrapani is ‘Misleading’.

What fact-check ?: 1 . Chinese Prime Minister Li Keqiang visited mosque seek protection country coronavirus . 2 . Chinese president Xi Jinping visited mosque China realizing fact Allah save China epidemic .
Explanation: The first video is of former malaysian Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi who visited a mosque in China during his visit in 2015. The second video is aslo an old one, President Xi Jinping paid a visit to the Xincheng Mosque in Yinchuan city, capital of NW China's Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region on Tuesday, July 19, 2016.

What fact-check ?: Chinese PM visited mosque following coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: The man in the viral video is former Malaysian Prime Minister, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi. The video was shot during his visit to China when he visited Beijing’s Nan Xia Po Mosque in July 2015.

What fact-check ?: 2019 novel coronavirus contains `` pShuttle-SN '' sequence proving laboratory origin .
Who said/posted it?: Alex Jones, Info Wars; Mike Adams, Natural News
Explanation: The pShuttle-SN vector was designed by researchers seeking to develop a potential SARS vaccine. However, the 2019 novel coronavirus does not contain a sequence from the pShuttle-SN vector as claimed. There is no evidence supporting the claim that 2019-nCoV is man-made.

What fact-check ?: When first group Japenese evacuated Wuhan Tokyo , evacuee took one ambulance .
Explanation: According to the Japanese media NHK, among 206 Japanese evacuees being withdrawn from Wuhan on January 29th, 199 evacuees took seven buses, and five evacuees took ambulances to the hospital for further examination.

What fact-check ?: There 40 thousand Chinese foreign workers Morowali quarantined Corona Virus ?
Explanation: There are only 5,390 foreign workers employed at the company.

What fact-check ?: Chinese kill pets due epidemic anxiety .
Explanation: The photo of a dead dog was verified. Others not. There is no evidence that there is a massive pet killing in China.

What fact-check ?: Weed , slang cannabis plant , `` kill coronavirus . ''
Explanation: As of Tuesday, February 18, the World Health Organization (WHO) said "there is still no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat" the novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV).

What fact-check ?: Original publication claims Macedonian citizens afraid order AliExpress way coronavirus transmitted .
Explanation: According to a statement from the Post Office, the institution has received no information on further action on the coronavirus by either the Ministry of Health or the World Postal Union. And this is because the coronavirus is not transmitted by post packages. Citizens are also aware of this fact. Thus, the claim of Faktor is false.

What fact-check ?: Videos Pigs buried China due coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: The videos posted are old. They are in no way related to the recent coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: The Chinese President Visits A Mosque To Ask Muslims ' Prayers To Fight coronavirus
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
