Explanation: Misbar investigated the video, and found it dates back to 2016, when Chinese President Xi Jiping visited a mosque in northwest China.

What fact-check ?: People Wuhan share laundry room although quarantine .
Explanation: People in Wuhan should clean their clothes in their room, by themselves.

What fact-check ?: When transporting patient , people wear facial mask violate safety measures .
Explanation: They also use ambulances with negative pressure ventilation equipment.

What fact-check ?: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang dinner Wuhan epidemic .
Explanation: Photo taken in 2013 in Sichuan.

What fact-check ?: The Dettol disinfectant label says cov tested .
Explanation: COv are a family of viruses

What fact-check ?: Research shows parts HIV genetic code inserted new coronavirus .
Explanation: Researchers from India indeed claim to have found HIV genetic sequences on the novel coronavirus, and speculate that it might indicate the new virus was artificially created. Nonetheless, these genetic sequences can be found in many different viruses, including some other strains of coronavirus. The paper, which was not peer reviewed, has been debunked by a wide array of researchers.

What fact-check ?: Xi Jinping visits mosque coronavirus .
Explanation: BOOM found that the video is from July 2016.

What fact-check ?: China asks permission kill 20000 infected cases .
Explanation: The website is renowned to share misinformation. There is no evidence for China asking for the same.

What fact-check ?: Woman eats bat soup contaminated coronavirus China .
Explanation: The video was recorded on the island of Palau, Micronesia in 2016.

What fact-check ?: People infected coronavirus die street doctors travel infection zone .
Explanation: Both images belong to different events. The first photo corresponds to a performance in Germany and the second photo portrays two doctors who care for Ebola sufferers in Uganda.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus `` hit '' Ghana .
Explanation: While there are reports of two suspects exhibiting symptoms of the said virus, both men tested negative. This is according to Dr Asare, the Chief Executive Officer of Korle-Bu Teaching Hospital.

What fact-check ?: China seeks approval court kill 20 000 coronavirus patients .
Explanation: There are a few inadequacies detected on the source’s website. Also, zero credible news platforms have published this claim. All these make the claim unsubstantial.

What fact-check ?: President Xi Jinping visits Masjid pray coronavirus vicitims .
Explanation: 2016 video of Xi Jjinping visiting a mosque is being shared in the context of the recent coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Peope behaving abnormally China due coronavirus .
Explanation: Old video clips are shared in the context of the recent coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus found Broiler Chicken .
Explanation: No evidence to prove that Coronovirus found in the broiler chickens. WHO has clarified that meat cooked properly can be consumed.

What fact-check ?: Video bats found tiles many roofs Hubei , China . They source coronavirus .
Explanation: The video was not taken in China. It’s an old video uploaded on 05 July 2011 by a Miami based roofing company called ‘Istueta Roofing’. The bats in the video were found under the tiles during the process of replacing a roof for a customer in Miami (US).

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus created laboratory Wuhan .
Explanation: There is no evidence that coronavirus was created in a laboratory in Wuhan.

What fact-check ?: Vitamin C stops slows novel coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: Health Impact News, Orthomolecular Medicine News Service
Explanation: There is, to date, no known cure for coronavirus. Medical professionals and researchers also said there was no conclusive evidence to suggest Vitamin C can treat or prevent coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: China seeking court ’ approval kill tested positive coronavirus .
Explanation: The official website of the National Health Commission of the People’s Republic of China uploaded the daily brief on coronavirus and there was no mention of any such case there

What fact-check ?: A picture Dettol disinfectant spray shared online label back bottle shows product claiming proven ‘ kill coronavirus ’ knew new strain since 2019 .
Explanation: The recent outbreak of coronavirus in China is a strain named 2019-nCoV. For this particular strain, the source of infection, animal host and reservoir are currently unknown.

What fact-check ?: Ultimo ( italian singer ) coronavirus .
Explanation: At today's date (Feb 6) in Italy we have only 2 case of coronavirus (2 Chinese citizens).

What fact-check ?: Share post Facebook , get free face masks .
Explanation: Taiwan FactCheck Center has shared that post following the instruction but didn't get any feedback. The posts had been neither deleted or revised afterward.

What fact-check ?: WHO Calls Isolation China due Corona Virus ?
Explanation: WHO states that they do not recommend restrictions on travel or trade with China.

What fact-check ?: Video shows infected baby doctor .
Explanation: Video uploaded on 14th of January. There was no reported case on that time. It does not fit the COVID-19 quarantina protocol.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus Discovered In Broilers Chicken .
Explanation: Unrelated images of ailing chicken shared with the claim that coronavirus has been discovered in broilers chicken. The viral post is fake.

What fact-check ?: A statement Bulgarian doctor claims consuming alcohol helps curing prevention new coronavirus , title original post alcohol CURE coronavirus .
Explanation: The only thing the WHO claims about alcohol and the coronavirus is that an alcohol-based hand sanitizer is recommended. It is a well known fact that there is no cure for the virus. There are medications that help treat the symptoms of the virus while you wait for the immune system to fight the virus, and vaccines are the best prevention.

What fact-check ?: You ca n't transmit virus people n't feel symptoms .
Explanation: It's more complicated than this, and that's why the French health minister corrected its communication on this matter.

What fact-check ?: Health insurance fee South Korea increase treatment cost Chinese patients .
Explanation: The cost of treatment for foreigner will be paid from state budget, not insurance companies.

What fact-check ?: Cannibalism China caused outbreak new strain novel coronavirus . A Chinese man preparing dead baby consumption .
Explanation: No, this photo shows a piece of performance art created by a Chinese artist in 2000.

What fact-check ?: Thai department health published infography properly wear facemasks .
Explanation: MOH denied.

What fact-check ?: This video shows cause cov .
Explanation: The video has circulated online since at least July 2011 and actually shows repairs being made to the roof of a bat-infested house in the city of Miami in the United States.

What fact-check ?: This video shows cov patients China .
Explanation: It's a school intiation in South Africa.

What fact-check ?: The Asterix comic books Simpsons predicted coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: Coronavirus has been around since the 1960s while the Simpsons picture was edited.

What fact-check ?: Tencent revealed real numbers dead people .
Explanation: We have no proof the screenshot is true. However, it seems really unlikely.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus already existed , even domestic animals , vaccine act virus .
Explanation: Wuhan coronavirus is not related to canine coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Taking chlorine dioxide helps coronavirus .
Explanation: Taking chlorine dioxide does not help against the coronavirus or against other diseases. It is harmful.

What fact-check ?: China seeks court approval kill 20,000 coronavirus patients stop spread outbreak .
Explanation: This unsubstantiated claim came from a website that published frequently false claims. There is no evidence that China went to courts looking for such approval. Claim was also debunked by several other outlets.

What fact-check ?: Chinese President Xi Jinping visited mosque amid coronavirus outbreak requested people Muslim community pray ‘ present crisis
Explanation: Chinese President Xi Jinping’s visit to the mosque is not related to coronavirus as the viral video is almost-four-year-old.

What fact-check ?: There patent 2019-nCoV coronavirus .
Explanation: A post claiming that the Pirbright Institute in the UK applied for a patent for the novel coronavirus outbreak, but uses documents showing a patent from 2015 that the institute holds for avian influenza virus, which is also a coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Government Philippines gave free masks streets .
Explanation: The government of the Philippines did donate face masks to several organizations but hadn't give face mask for free on the street at least by Feb. 7, 2020.

What fact-check ?: WHO announced among many medicines , best coronavirus killer nicotine .
Explanation: WHO hasn't published such a study nor recommendation. To date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Doctor said : coronavirus alive temperature 25-26C . Drinking hot water help prevent .
Explanation: Coronavirus can be active in temperature 25-26C. Drinking hot water does not prevent the new coronavirus disease.

What fact-check ?: If runny nose cough , n't COVID-19 .
Explanation: Runny nose and dry cough are among the symptoms of COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Vietnam government gave free face masks streets .
Explanation: The film documented the charity event organized by motorcycle group, not Vietnam government.

What fact-check ?: Chinese President Visits Mosque Prayers Corona Virus Outbreak ?
Explanation: The video was taken in 2016, before the coronavirus was first reported in Wuhan in December 2019.

What fact-check ?: Is Biohazard Container Discovery Photo American Consulate General Wuhan ?
Explanation: No news was found from the Xinhua news agency or other media related to the findings of the biohazard container.

What fact-check ?: Weed ( cannabis ) cures coronavirus .
Explanation: In the absence of any evidence, the claim is found to be misleading.

What fact-check ?: Tencent claims 24,000 patients died China .
Explanation: We have only proved that the screenshots can be manipulated using HTML but whether the number is actually that much and the government is hiding it is not known.

What fact-check ?: China planning kill coronavirus patients .
Explanation: A hoax website, which has been called out multiple times by various fact-checkers for spreading fake news, has published an article without any source of information to claim that China is planning to kill over 20,000 patients who have been infected by coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Sanitizer manufacturer Dettol knew 2019 Novel coronavirus actually reported .
Explanation: The label of Dettol mentioning that it kills coronavirus is not the recent strain of coronavirus. They have not tested its products for the recent noval coronavirus. Misleading post is getting viral.

What fact-check ?: China sought kill 20,000 coronavirus patients control spread virus .
Explanation: No media outlet has reported it. Also, the claim originates from a rather suspicious website.

What fact-check ?: China court gave permission kill 20,000 patients affected coronavirus .
Explanation: There is no evidence for the claim that the Chinese court had ordered to kill the 20,000 patients affected with coronavirus. Also, the website that published this news had published few fake news stories in the past.

What fact-check ?: Tips Professor Wong Kin-Chung delay progress COVID-19 condition : rinsing mouth cold salty water ; drinking water red wine ; taking vitamin C ; chicken soup , shiitake mushroom , astragalus , codonopsis , ginseng .
Explanation: There is no evidence that those mentioned in the claim can prevent COVID-19. Plus, we are not able to identify Professor Wong Kin-Chung, a medical professor, doctor as well as a nutritionist in the USA, who allegely made that claim.

What fact-check ?: This Lysol disinfactant label says 's tested new cov .
Explanation: Covs a a family of viruses.

What fact-check ?: Weed kills coronavirus .
Explanation: The news clip was created through a meme generator while the WHO has stated that there are no proved cures for the virus yet.

What fact-check ?: People screaming Wuhan feared coronavirus .
Explanation: The video is actually of Wuhan residents whistling and shouting to commemorate Dr. Li Wenliang, the whistleblower of the virus who died on February 7 after getting infected.

What fact-check ?: Kazakhstanis burned smashed Chinese restaurants homes spread coronavirus country .
Explanation: The video is real, but the text was misleading. There is no connections between pogroms and coronavirus. It was an ethnic conflict between Kazakhs and Dungans that arose on domestic grounds

What fact-check ?: Autopsy reveal Wuhan doctor murdered sickbed .
Explanation: The story fabricates a quote and did not offer on-the-record source for its claim. It also came from a website that frequently publishes false information. Other news outlets confirmed Li Wenliang died from the coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Says 2019 coronavirus `` causes sudden death syndrome . ''
Explanation: There is no evidence that the virus causes sudden death syndrome.

What fact-check ?: Can Dettol Cleaners Kill Corona Virus ?
Explanation: coronavirus in question is a type of coronavirus MERS-CoV, SARS-CoV, and Human coronavirus that refers to the common cold

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus found broiler chicken .
Explanation: Post claiming coronavirus found in broiler chicken is fake.

What fact-check ?: Image Pakistani Prime minister Imran Khan Chinese president Xi Jinping Imran Khan wearing mask .
Explanation: Edited image of Imran Khan and Xi Jimping viral with wrong claim.

What fact-check ?: China Killed Pigs For Fear coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: The video is misleading.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus caused snakes .
Explanation: There is no conlusive proof that snakes have caused the spread of the Wuhan coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus infected girl admitted Badulla Hospital Sri Lanka .
Explanation: “The girl was tested negative for coronavirus, and she was administered medicines for her ailment and then discharged”.

What fact-check ?: Ginger ale effective cure 2019 novel coronavirus ( nCoV ) .
Who said/posted it?: Facebook page Natural Cures : Halamang Gamot.
Explanation: The World Health Organization (WHO) said drinking traditional herbal teas is “not specifically recommended as 2019-nCoV remedies as they are not effective to protect yourself and can be even harmful.”

What fact-check ?: The Department Health ( DOH ) Bureau Immigration ( BI ) `` issued lookout bulletin '' `` arrest detention '' Chinese man `` escaped quarantine area '' Ninoy Aquino International Airport ( NAIA ) .
Explanation: The BI clarified in a statement that the story of the foreigner's "escape" from NAIA's quarantine area is a hoax. Further, the DOH did not issue any advisory or bulletin about a foreigner who escaped the NAIA quarantine area.

What fact-check ?: COVID-19 stolen Canada Chinese spies accidentally released Wuhan .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Hong Kong police misappropriating face masks personal use .
Explanation: Photo circulating since 2018.

What fact-check ?: This photo shows new case New South Wales .
Explanation: Local autorities denied it.

What fact-check ?: Green chiratta prevent cov .
Explanation: No scientific evidence for that.

What fact-check ?: China officially said new coronavirus `` confirmed aerosol infection '' `` short , airborne infections '' spread .
Explanation: Aerosol infections are rare and different from airborne infections.

What fact-check ?: Ecuadorean doctor saves lifes Wuhan crisis .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: A case coronavirus Andorra .
Explanation: There is no case of coronavirus in Andorras (as of 10 of February).

What fact-check ?: A child China coronavirus Galicia ( Spain )
Explanation: There are no children infected with coronavirus in Spain at this date.

What fact-check ?: A person coronavirus Andorra ( February 10th ) .
Explanation: As of February 10, there is no confirmed case of coronavirus in Andorra.

What fact-check ?: Special prayer organized Muslim community China save people coronavirus .
Explanation: Viral video has got nothing to do with the recent coronavirus outbreak

What fact-check ?: Satellite images showing high levels sulphur dioxide China possible evidence mass cremations people died coronavirus .
Explanation: False. The maps are not satellite images, and do not show actual levels of sulphur dioxide. They are simply forecasts based on historical data and weather patterns.

What fact-check ?: Can cannabis cure coronavirus ?
Explanation: The image has been created with the help of a website called dopl3r. No government mandate or science research or WHO have commented on cannabis and if it can cure coronavirus or not.

What fact-check ?: A case coronavirus Caserta .
Explanation: There is no case of coronavirus in Caserta (at 10 of February)

What fact-check ?: Bill Gates predicted coronavirus .
Explanation: Bill Gates didn't predict coronavirus 2019-nCoV

What fact-check ?: In 2012 Facebook user predicted coronavirus China .
Explanation: The Facebook status wasn't the original one. It has been modified on the 27th of January 2020.

What fact-check ?: India scientists found : HIV gene embedded 2019-nCov , China 's bio-weapon .
Explanation: Uncanny similarity of unique inserts in the 2019-nCoV spike protein to HIV-1 gp120 and Gag》.

What fact-check ?: Singapore - Hong Kong People ran supermarket panic buying toilet paper .
Explanation: The video was filmed in China and was already uploaded online on October 4th, 2019.

What fact-check ?: An apartment Wuhan fire since owner over-sprayed ethanol . He turned heat , causing explosion .
Explanation: The video was filmed in Chongqing, not in Wuhan.

What fact-check ?: Chinese citizens join Muslim prayers fear coronavirus ?
Explanation: The video was taken during Eid prayer at the Yiwu Mosque, China, in June 2019, before the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak occurred.

What fact-check ?: The people video show coronavirus patients China ?
Explanation: The video of initiation activities at a secondary school in South Africa.

What fact-check ?: Garlic Water Can Cure Novel coronavirus .
Explanation: Garlic is a healthy food that may have some antimicrobial properties. However, there is no evidence from the current outbreak that eating garlic has protected people from the new coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: A woman infected coronavirus killed Chinese police .
Explanation: The woman in the viral video was taken into custody for violating traffic restrictions in China’s Heilongjiang province.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus found Broiler Chicken .
Explanation: No evidence to prove that Coronovirus found in the broiler chickens. WHO has clarified that meat cooked properly can be consumed.

What fact-check ?: Novel coronavirus came South Korea yellow sand storm .
Explanation: The virus dies after staying in the air for some time.

What fact-check ?: Crackdown drunken driving stopped due risk Covid-19 transmission
Explanation: The crackdown is ongoing ; it's a separate operation.

What fact-check ?: Claim 2019 novel coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) deadly Ebola HIV .
Explanation: Based on the evidence, AAP FactCheck found the Facebook post to be false. The post’s claim that coronavirus is the most deadly disease in history is not correct. Global fatalities for HIV and Ebola are far higher, figures from the World Health Organization and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention show.

What fact-check ?: Chinese supreme court ok 'd euthanasia 20 000 people .
Explanation: The article was published on a site that has regularly produced hoax reports, and China has made no such announcement.

What fact-check ?: 2 cov cases Libreville , Gongo .
Explanation: Authorities denied it.

What fact-check ?: Videos stating 25,000 Chinese killed .
Explanation: Three different videos - 2 unrelated to the coronavirus and one with overlaid music wre clubbed together with false claims.

What fact-check ?: Raúl Rodolfo Abhuz Khan , biochemical engineer Karmalah laboratories creator coronavirus .
Explanation: The Auronplay YouTube image was used in a screenshot that is being used in misinformations to "denounce" the "multi-million dollar pharmaceutical business" behind the coronavirus. First, CNN did not publish this news at any time and the man in the photo is also Raúl Álvarez (Auronplay), a famous Spanish youtuber.

What fact-check ?: A chinese pirate movie called `` coronavirus '' sold Mexico City .
Explanation: The video is actually a 2013 South Korean film called Gamgi.

What fact-check ?: People In Wuhan Locked inside houses Chinese goverment .
Explanation: The video is of people in wuhan offering their respects to the whistleblower, doctor Li Wenliang.

What fact-check ?: People lying ground China got coronavirus .
Explanation: Video comes from South Africa during a initiation rite in a private school.

What fact-check ?: Can pets contaminate humans ?
Explanation: According to the WHO, there is no evidence that dogs or cats can be infected with the new coronavirus. French medical experts confirm that a virus crossing the species barrier is rare.

What fact-check ?: Cats dogs infected contaminate humans COVID-19 .
Explanation: There is no evidence that pets such as dogs or cats can be infected with the new coronavirus, say WHO and French medical experts.

What fact-check ?: “ Breaking : UK Prepares For Full Lockdown After Hundreds Of New Cases — Wuhan Super Virus Updates . ”
Explanation: Only about a dozen coronavirus cases have been confirmed in the United Kingdom.

What fact-check ?: Overseas Chinese bought flights ship medical supplies Melbourne South China .
Explanation: To ship the medical supplies donated by Chinese entrepreneurs in Kenya, the Chinese airline upgraded passengers to business class and used the economic class to place all donation goods.

What fact-check ?: In Chinese city Shandong , one gets COVID-19 's full garlic .
Explanation: There is no evidence that garlic has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus. Plus, there was a confirmed case in Shandong. (Feb. 11, 2020)

What fact-check ?: Russian doctor taught : washing nostril soap prevent COVID-19 .
Explanation: There is no evidence that rinsing nostril has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus. To date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Is Thailand Successfully Cure Corona Virus Patients Marijuana ?
Explanation: Antiflu and anti-HIV drugs used by doctors in Thailand to treat patients with the coronavirus do not contain cannabis.

What fact-check ?: Is Chinese Government Requests Court Permission Kill 20 Thousand Corona Virus Patients ?
Explanation: There is no credible source that states this claim.

What fact-check ?: China seeks approval court kill 20 000 coronavirus patients .
Explanation: Source is not reliable and zero credible news platforms have published. There is no such a hearing in supreme court's schedule.

What fact-check ?: Video shows coronavirus patients doctors
Explanation: The original video is from South Africa, not China.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus-infected chicken found Bengaluru .
Explanation: Viral image of sick chicken is old and not related to coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Twenty Million Chinese Convert To Islam After coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar checked the circulating news, and found that it was not true; no Chinese website published this news or even similar. As for the image circulated in the memorial service of the President of the Islamic Association of Shanghai Province in 2018 upon his death, no official party has announced that a large number of Chinese have embraced Islam after the spread of COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Koreans cruiseship 'Diamond Princess ' brought back .
Explanation: It is possible by negotiating with Government of Japan.

What fact-check ?: Philippines issued order mandating compulsory quarantine travellers returning 23 countries .
Explanation: Philippine authorities did not issue this warning after the novel coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: USPS stops accepting items China HK .
Explanation: USPS told AFP on February 12 it would continue to accept items bound for China and Hong Kong but could temporarily not offer time guarantees on those shipments; it clarified that it will temporarily halt its transit service that ships mail from other countries to China and Hong Kong.

What fact-check ?: Black people resistent Cov .
Explanation: Dakar's Institut Pasteur denies.

What fact-check ?: In Japan , Okinawa Prefecture Governor Tamaki Denny seen Kachashi dancing mayor Nanjo City . It reported `` governor mayor danced people terrified new coronavirus infection . ''
Explanation: It is true that Governor Tamaki danced Kachashi with Mayor Zukeran in January 25. But this is before a cruise ship anchored in Naha.

What fact-check ?: The Pinol brand disinfectant solution coronavirus .
Explanation: COVID-19 was discovered at the end of 2019 and cleaners have not proven its effectiveness against this virus.

What fact-check ?: In voice note , pilot greets airport San José del Guaviare says quarantine along people , 18 22 , arrived city plane diagnosed infected coronavirus .
Explanation: WhatsApp circulates an audio of an alleged pilot infected with the new coronavirus, but what he says is a lie. So far, there is no confirmed case in Colombia.

What fact-check ?: New coronavirus arrives Colombia .
Explanation: The piece says the Wuhan coronavirus was afound in a patient in the town of Ibagué, Colombia, and shows a written diagnosis to show it. However, the image shows it to be a different sort of coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: China orders citizens abandon/kill pets transmit coronavirus .
Explanation: Several state outlets have asked citizens not to abandon their pets. We also didn't find any local authorities ordering the killing of pets.

What fact-check ?: Vitamin C Omega prevents coronavirus .
Explanation: There isn't any food that can prevent coronavirus infection.

What fact-check ?: Germans quarantined La Gomera coronavirus leave home isolation without permission .
Explanation: The Ministry of Health of the Canary Islands denies they have returned to Germany.

What fact-check ?: Chinese elderly couple infected coronavirus say goodbye hospital .
Explanation: The elderly couple hospitalized for other conditions such as lung cancer and respiratory failure.

What fact-check ?: Police Publicly Kill A coronavirus-Infected Woman In China .
Explanation: Video on social media is not related to coronavirus. The woman in the viral video was taken into custody for violating traffic restrictions in China’s Heilongjiang province.

What fact-check ?: Will coronavirus epidemic disappear April thanks heat , Donald Trump said ?
Explanation: It's impossible to predict the evolution of this epidemi, because this coronavirus is a new virus. Weather probably plays a role, but it remains to be determined among other factors.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus cases reported Rome , Georgia
Explanation: The medical facility issued a statement saying there was not a confirmed case.

What fact-check ?: `` THE CHINESE HAVE BEGUN TO USE THEIR HUMAN CORPES TO PROCESS INTO PRODUCTS SUCH AS CORNED BEEF TO SHIP TO AFRICA . Please share contacts .. Very important ''
Explanation: The video might be of Tibet or China’s Sichuan as residents of both these territories perform such rituals. However, we haven’t found the origin of this claim hence we can not emphasize whether or not visuals in this video belong to Sky Burial. But from our findings it is evident that the video is in no way related to the coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: China seeking court ’ approval kill 20000 people positive coronavirus
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Hand sanitizer form 2010 labeled coronavirus 2019-nCoV .
Explanation: The hand sanitizer marked in 2010 was against the general coronavirus. It wasn't related with the coronavirus-nCoV.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus pandemic dramatically slowed , stopped , immediate widespread use high doses vitamin C .
Explanation: Maintaining an adequate intake of vitamin C is important for staying healthy. However, evidence from clinical trials shows that regular vitamin C supplementation does not prevent viral respiratory tract infections such as the common cold, which can be caused by coronaviruses, in the general population. Although some studies have shown a reduced incidence of the common cold in individuals undergoing severe physical stress, such as marathon runners.

What fact-check ?: The coronavirus pandemic dramatically slowed , stopped , immediate widespread use high doses vitamin C .
Who said/posted it?: Andrew W. Saul, Orthomolecular Medicine News Service
Explanation: Maintaining an adequate intake of vitamin C is important for staying healthy. However, evidence from clinical trials shows that regular vitamin C supplementation does not prevent viral respiratory tract infections such as the common cold, which can be caused by coronaviruses, in the general population. Although some studies have shown a reduced incidence of the common cold in individuals undergoing severe physical stress, such as marathon runners.

What fact-check ?: Putting onion room help prevent COVID-19 .
Explanation: No evidence that placing onions in the room has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: China scientist Ms Shih generated coronavirus .
Explanation: A SARS-like cluster of circulating bat coronaviruses shows potential for human emergence.

What fact-check ?: Hold breath 10 seconds . If able , infected COVID-19 .
Explanation: There is no evidence to support this claim. People must have a test conducted by hospitals or legitimate labs to determine the infection with COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Miles Kwok : China military admitted Conoravirus made China . It human-made bio-weapon .
Explanation: Miles Kwok didn't mention nor suggest that COVID-19 is human-made bio-weapon.

What fact-check ?: Was Corona Antivirus Discovered Israeli Chinese Doctors ?
Explanation: Remdesivir as novel coronavirus antivirus is being carried out in collaboration with various institutions, not related to specific ethnicity or religion.

What fact-check ?: 2019-nCoV officially found bats .
Explanation: The content of both The Daily Mail and Verter News did not say bats were “officially” the source of the 2019-nCoV, only that they were “likely” to be its source.

What fact-check ?: China Seeks Court ’ Approval To Kill 20000 coronavirus Patients .
Explanation: Post claiming China seeks court’s approval to kill 20000 coronavirus patients is fake.

What fact-check ?: Photos Chinese man eating “ human baby soup ” circulated social networking platforms . He seen sitting table stillborn baby served front .
Explanation: The photos were from a performance art show by Chinese artist Zhu Yu in 2000.

What fact-check ?: Silver Solution used strains coronavirus `` totally eliminate . Kills . Deactivates . ”
Explanation: There are no pills or remedies that cure any strain of human coronavirus including COVID-19. In fact, Sellman’s "silver solution," and colloidal silver, can hurt you, and not just your wallet.

What fact-check ?: The Sudanese Minister Did Put A Mask While Meeting The Chinese Ambassador .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar found the original image posted on the official page of the Sudanese Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Twitter, on February 3 of this year.

What fact-check ?: This test lung COVID-19 self-check .
Explanation: It's just general lung test, not a specific test for COVID-19. It's not the good way to protect yourself.

What fact-check ?: COVID-19 caused 5G antennas .
Link to the original piece: Facebook user, post is now deleted
Explanation: There is no proof that 5G network has anything to do with the outbreak of a novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Boiled ginger cure cov .
Explanation: Doctors deny this.

What fact-check ?: A video claims show plane carrying medical supplies China .
Explanation: This video shows a plane in Kenya carrying humanitarian aid bound for China.

What fact-check ?: COVID-19 means `` China Outbreak Virus '' .
Explanation: It means coronavirus disease.

What fact-check ?: Satelite images show increase SO2 emissions around Wuhan .
Explanation: Images were actually from a weather forecast, based on historical data and meteorological conditions. No use of real-time data.

What fact-check ?: A video shows family killed coronavirus amid China ’ multi-city lockdown .
Who said/posted it?: Users on Weibo, YouTube, FB, WhatsApp
Explanation: False: The video does not show a family killed by the coronavirus amid China’s multi-city lockdown. The family was reported to have died of carbon monoxide poisoning in Dec 2019.

What fact-check ?: Satellite images showing high levels sulphur dioxide China possible evidence mass cremations people died coronavirus .
Explanation: This is a forecast based on historical data. Full Fact analysis was mentioned in our article.

What fact-check ?: There Cuban drug used China coronavirus .
Explanation: Despite the article cited by the presidente and the Cuban embassy in China claiming that this medicine is being used by Health Secretary in China, there are no proof about it and Interferón 2B has another uses.

What fact-check ?: The Chinese news website Tencent filters 24,000 deaths coronavirus .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Claims cannibalism China . People cutting baby order eat .
Explanation: This actually shows an autopsy on a baby.

What fact-check ?: A person coronavirus Calella , Barcelona ( February 13th ) .
Explanation: This is denied by the health authorities.

What fact-check ?: Chinese government requests Supreme People 's Court permission kill 20,000 coronavirus patients stop spread disease
Explanation: China has not sought the permission of the country's Supreme People's Court to execute 20,000 coronavirus patients.

What fact-check ?: Weed kills coronavirus .
Explanation: Weed doesn’t kill coronavirus. Fake post getting viral.

What fact-check ?: Bats responsible outbreak coronavirus originated rooftop house Wuhan .
Explanation: The viral video is around nine years old and is from Miami, USA.

What fact-check ?: Fake Video Clip Shows Killing Infected People With COVID-19 .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: The clip is fabricated and made up of 3 non-related clips.

What fact-check ?: Epidemics Spreads In The Twentieth Year Every Hundred Years .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: False allegations.

What fact-check ?: Crows flocking Wuhan .
Explanation: This video shows crows in the Chinese city of Xining -- 1,000 miles from Wuhan.

What fact-check ?: A map shows hundreds thousands Wuhan residents ( even 5 million ) traveling city lockdown .
Who said/posted it?: Tweet by a research group at University of Southampton. Later many news outlets in UK and Australia
Explanation: The map is merely “an illustrative picture of the global air network” that shows international flight connections.

What fact-check ?: China orders citizens abandon/kill pets transmit coronavirus .
Explanation: There is no proof that Chinese authorities have ordererd the killing of pets; however, there is proof that some Chinese authorities have apporved killings of stray dogs and cats in order to stop the spreading of the virus. The WHO says that right now there is no evidence that the virus can be transmitted through pets.

What fact-check ?: This photo `` chinese tapa '' ¨from bat .
Explanation: False: The picture is not of a Chinese dish, but of a soup from Guam island (United States)

What fact-check ?: A video Chinese epidemiologist saying millions infected .
Explanation: The video was longer than the version shared in Twitter. The epidemiologist said that if Chinese Government had not taken action, there would be millions of infected by coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: People Wuhan locked inside houses trying escape building fire .
Explanation: The fire was caused due to electrical wiring failure. This video is not related to COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: WHO declared COVID-19 abbreviation China Outbreak Virus In December 19 .
Explanation: WHO declared the official name of coronavirus as COVID-19, which stands for coronavirus Disease. It has been falsely claimed to be an abbreviation for China Outbreak Virus In December 19.

What fact-check ?: Video police killing COVID-19 affected people China .
Explanation: The posted video was edited with three unrelated clips to falsely claim that Police with arms are killing people. The Yiwu Police have clarified that the armed Police in the video were on their duty to kill a rabid dog. And, the last clip is related to an accident.

What fact-check ?: Does sulfur dioxide pollution Wuhan reveal China burning bodies victims ?
Explanation: The map behind the rumor is not a real-time air quality report, but a forecast based on past datas, which therefore cannot take account of alleged recent events.

What fact-check ?: Residential building set fire Wuhan control spread coronavirus .
Explanation: A fire broke out in a different city in China, but officials said the fire had no connection to the coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: High-rise buildings become human incinerators combat spread coronavirus
Explanation: There was no concrete evidence to prove that buildings were being burned to stop coronavirus. The Twitter authority cited in the story was not credible.

What fact-check ?: The Windy diagram sulfur dioxyde emission level Wuhan indicated massive corpses burning .
Explanation: Fa-lun Gong media published several news about this topic. It also was reported or cited by the other mainstream media.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus created lab Wuhan .
Explanation: No scientific evidence exists to assert that the coronavirus was created in a lab. According to the WHO, “Both Chinese and external expert groups are working in trying to identify the animal source of this new virus.”

What fact-check ?: Chicken Infected From coronavirus Found In Bangalore .
Explanation: Post claiming chicken infected from coronavirus found in Bangalore is fake. The image is old and is not related to 2019 novel coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Video police killing COVID-19 affected people China .
Explanation: The posted video was edited with three unrelated clips to falsely claim that Police with arms are killing people. The Yiwu Police have clarified that the armed Police in the video were on their duty to kill a rabid dog. And, the last clip is related to an accident.

What fact-check ?: Ginger cure protect COVID-19 .
Explanation: Unable to conclude like that, even ginger may good for health, but it's no scientific proof on COVID-19 yet.

What fact-check ?: This map “ based traces Wuhan citizens ” , period outbreak new coronavirus blockade Wuhan .
Explanation: This map is an image showing the routes of passenger aircraft around the world, and it is incorrect to use "maps based on traces of movement"

What fact-check ?: A large amount sulfur dioxide observed Wuhan 14000 bodies incinerated .
Explanation: The source of the information is "Windy.com", but even if the body was burned, "Windy.com" does not show real-time sulfur dioxide.

What fact-check ?: In two videos YouTube channel said Ibagué cases COVID-19 Colombian government covering .
Explanation: In two videos of a YouTube channel it is said that in Ibagué there are cases of coronavirus and that the Colombian government is covering it up. However, this information is false.

What fact-check ?: New confirmed cases COVID-19 Kolkatta reported Press trust India .
Explanation: A clear case of misreporting done by PTI. There are no confirmed coronavirus patients in Kolkata/Confirmed both by the airport authority of Kolkatta and the Traveller

What fact-check ?: High levels sulfur dioxide Wuhan “ may sign mass cremations victims coronavirus . ''
Explanation: The photo shows sulfur dioxide projections. It is not a real-time satellite image.

What fact-check ?: Someone Bosnia Herzegovina captured Diamond Princess cruiser quarantine . After receiving results negative coronavirus , returned BiH .
Explanation: This man was not on the cruiser, was not quarantined and was not tested for the virus. He personally said all this for several media in the region, but later said that he was scammed by his friends.

What fact-check ?: Drinking much hot water prevent getting COVID-19 .
Explanation: There has been no information nor evidence to suggest that drinking hot water has protected people from infection with the new coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Nan-shan Zhong said vegetarian getting COVID-19 .
Explanation: Nan-shan Zhong hasn't had such a comment. There is no evidence to support this claim, either.

What fact-check ?: A video viewed hundreds times multiple social media posts alongside claim shows Chinese Muslims performing communal Friday prayer mosque despite novel coronavirus pandemic .
Explanation: The claim is false; the video has circulated in reports about Muslims performing a mass prayer at a mosque in the western Chinese city of Xining in 2011, nine years before the novel coronavirus outbreak.

What fact-check ?: China announced sucess Egyptian serum form Dr. Hala , Ealth Miniter Egypt , coronavirus
Explanation: WHO says there is no known cure of vaccine to the coronavirus for now.

What fact-check ?: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte orders state hospital accept COVID-19 patients Wuhan .
Explanation: Duterte’s speeches prior to the publication of City News’ false report have made no mention of PGH being used for Chinese patients with COVID-19. Neither have legitimate news media organizations reported on this.

What fact-check ?: Upon approval Supreme People 's Court , China kill 20,000 patients novel coronavirus .
Explanation: There is no such case being tried at the Supreme People’s Court of China. The high court’s record of scheduled hearings on its official website does not show that it was set to decide on such a case on Feb. 7, and neither is there a record of it on the resolved cases tab and press releases.

What fact-check ?: China Declares Nuclear War On America .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: The news is false, as Misbar did not find a basis for it in the Chinese official media, or in the credible international media.

What fact-check ?: A video claims showing Eid prayer China dec 19 .
Who said/posted it?: Multiple FB, twiter an YOutube posts
Explanation: This is a prayer in China in June 19, not related to Cov.

What fact-check ?: Video showing quarantined people building Shanghai .
Explanation: This video shows tower blocks in Shanghai, not Wuhan – and the clip has been edited to include the audio

What fact-check ?: Thailnd cures CoV anti-HIV drugs .
Explanation: Thai doctors say their treatment helped a coronavirus patient recover, but it was not a ‘cure’.

What fact-check ?: COVID-19 case east Indian state .
Explanation: Local health authority said that there are no confirmed novel coronavirus patients in the area at the time.

What fact-check ?: Cov case Ethiopia .
Explanation: No case at this date.

What fact-check ?: Cuban medicine cures COVID-19 .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Consuming magnesium chloride , sodium bicarbonate , ginger lemon juice prevents coronavirus infection .
Explanation: No health organization has recommended eating any of these products to prevent coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Bus driver China vomits blood becoming unconscious behind wheel .
Explanation: This video dates back to 2015 when a driver in Xiamen, China was suffering from gastrointestinal bleeding.

What fact-check ?: Video showing Massive Explosion Wuhan , China control spread coronavirus .
Explanation: Viral video on social media dates back to 2015 when there were giant explosions at the Chinese port of Tianjin. This video is old and has no relation with coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Latest research Chinese scientists said coronavirus render male patients infertile .
Explanation: The study has not been peer-reviewed. But the study also does not go as far as to say coronavirus will definitely cause infertility in men.

What fact-check ?: Cloud rain Wuhan brought virus Taiwan .
Explanation: COVID-19 spreads from person to person through small droplets from the nose or mouth which are spread when a person with COVID-19 coughs or exhales. Plus, coronavirus can't survive in clouds.

What fact-check ?: This Burned Building Is Place Corona Virus Patient Isolation
Explanation: The burning building was an apartment in California Park, Yubei District, Chongqing City on January 1, 2020, not a hotel where COVID-19 patients were isolated.

What fact-check ?: SO2 map proves massive human cremation Wuhan .
Explanation: Calculations about the possible sulfur burning and certain degree of air pollution are not consistant.

What fact-check ?: An `` official '' mask combat novel coronavirus released .
Explanation: The mask for sale is the Monata reusable dust pollution mask, which is used for woodworking, house cleaning, gardening, and other outdoor activities.

What fact-check ?: No Confirmation That North Korea Executed An Official After Breaking The Quarantine .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: North Korea executes a commercial official suspected of being infected with the COVID-19, for breaking a quarantine and going to a public toilet. There is no evidence to substantiate the claim.

What fact-check ?: An Australian couple ordered wine drone princess cruise ship .
Explanation: The couple said it was a prank.

What fact-check ?: This map shows global spread cov .
Explanation: This map shows flight paths worldwide -- it does not show the movement of Wuhan residents.

What fact-check ?: Drinking alcohol kills coronavirus .
Explanation: Drinking alcohol does not cure coronavirus, alcohol in sanitizers does have an effect.

What fact-check ?: Exactly every 100 years viral epidemic breaks .
Explanation: These epidemics have not arisen exactly 20 years after the beginning of each century.

What fact-check ?: 7 children die coronavirus 1 week Karimganj ( Assam , India ) .
Explanation: Public Health Officials have denied any coronavirus death, these clildren died in a span of 2 months due to fever and other illness.

What fact-check ?: Data shows massive release sulfur dioxide gas near Wuhan .
Explanation: The images in the Twitter posts are not satellite measurements, and a member of NASA said the images did not show significantly increased SO2 measurements. Some other websites cited the images as evidence -- though false -- of bodies being burned due to coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Popping bubble wrap exposes people coronavirus .
Explanation: Bubble wrap is not produced by people blowing air into the plastic. Claim originated from a satirical Facebook page that was shut down.

What fact-check ?: A blog post claiming COVID-19 name vaccine novel coronavirus .
Explanation: A blog post claiming that the World Health Organization has announced COVID-19 as a vaccine against the novel coronavirus has a false headline. There is no vaccine yet for the disease.

What fact-check ?: 20 million Chinese people converted Islam ’ proven coronavirus ’ affect Muslims .
Explanation: Video claiming to show Chinese converting to Islam after the current coronavirus outbreak was published before the first reported case in Wuhan in 2019.

What fact-check ?: This video late Chinese doctor Li-wen Liang 's wedding party
Explanation: The video is about the wedding of a Taiwanese couple filmed in Taiwan.

What fact-check ?: Dr. Chao Chien Kuo Wuhan Central hospital said : drinking alcohol prevent COVID-19 .
Explanation: Dr. Chao Chien Kuo had had such a comment, but it was a joke in his private chat group, not an official recommendation. There is no evidence that drinking alcohol can prevent or treat COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Having 14 face masks enough . You reuse every 14 days since incubation period 14 days .
Explanation: 14 days of incubation doesn't mean that the coronavirus can be alive for 14 days. People should not reuse single-use-mask.

What fact-check ?: Are Chinese Really Converting Islam Avoid Corona Virus ?
Explanation: The video is a religious activity carried out by ICDO in the Philippines which circulated on the internet before the coronavirus was first reported in December 2019.

What fact-check ?: Is It Really Video Crow Attack Jumbo Mosquito China Corona Virus Plague ?
Explanation: The video is edited by combining several different videos and images.

What fact-check ?: Cocaine kills coronavirus .
Explanation: Post claiming cocaine kills coronavirus is fake.

What fact-check ?: A post shared repeatedly Facebook claims taking hot bath effective remedy novel coronavirus , COVID-19 .
Explanation: Health experts say there is no scientific evidence that bathing in hot water can prevent people from catching the virus; the World Health Organisation (WHO) warned that bathing or showering in very hot water can be “harmful”.

What fact-check ?: This bottle disinfectant gel prooves coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 existed 2019 .
Explanation: Different kinds of coronavirus existed years before SARS-CoV-2, the one which is responsible of COVID-19. That's why the term coronavirus is written on this bottle.

What fact-check ?: Swarms Crows Attack The Streets Wuhan .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: The videos are fake.

What fact-check ?: The Egyptian Minister Health Announced A Cure For coronavirus Extracted From Dates .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar investigated the authenticity of the news attributed to the Egyptian Minister of Health, and found that the image was first published on a Facebook page called Kolloh Rayeh, and it turns out that the same page was the one that designed the fabricated image and spread the news.

What fact-check ?: People queue Singapore Halal food .
Explanation: They are queuing for masks.

What fact-check ?: In Japan , new coronavirus test negative , cost 80,000 yen . If positive , state bear cost .
Explanation: No voluntary testing of the new coronavirus has been performed. The test is "when it is determined that the prefecture is necessary based on travel history and contact history with patients", but in this case, the test cost is public expense regardless of negative or positive, and it is "free".

What fact-check ?: This video shows corpses streets Wuhan .
Explanation: It is in Shenzhen and shows people coming from Hubei sleeping in the streets because no one wants to rent them a rool.

What fact-check ?: World labs confirm : coronavirus bioengineered .
Explanation: There is no evidence of this.

What fact-check ?: Article suggests African skin blood resistant coronavirus .
Explanation: There is no evidence to suggest “black people’s” immunity to the virus, or conversely “white people’s” vulnerability to it. The World Health Organisation (WHO) already stated that anyone in proximity to an infected person is at risk of contracting it (COVID-19).

What fact-check ?: In Nigerian , Ibrahim Magu , Acting EFCC Chairman attributed corruption reason coronavirus .
Explanation: Coronavirus recently named COVID-19 by the World Health Organisation is a disease. Further, health authorities surmise it emanated from the wet markets in China; being a zoonotic disease. And while the jury’s out on the full clinical picture for COVID-19’s, no evidence suggests it to be a function of moral misconduct or the activities of corrupt individuals.

What fact-check ?: Chinese elderly couple infected coronavirus say goodbye hospital .
Explanation: The elderly couple hospitalized for other conditions such as lung cancer and respiratory failure.

What fact-check ?: Chinese police kill woman escaping COVID-19 quarantine China .
Explanation: The scene actually shows a motorbike accident.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus biological warfare weapon .
Explanation: Dr. Francis Boyle did say that coronvirus is a biological warfare weapon, but the story lacks context. There is no supporting evidence to back up that suggestion. It was debunked as a rumor and untrue that coronavirus was made in a lab.

What fact-check ?: Chinese converting Islam realising muslim affected # coronavirus # COVD19 country .
Explanation: The viral video is old and not related to coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Says 2008 book “ End Days ” predicted current coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: Dean Koontz, not Sylvia Browne, wrote about “Wuhan-400”.

What fact-check ?: This Dr. Li-wen Liang 's funeral ceremony .
Explanation: Dr. Li died on Feb. 7., 2020. The video was uploaded on Nov. 19. 2018.

What fact-check ?: The amount ACE2 East Asian people 4-5 times non-East-Asians . That get infected easily .
Explanation: The claim quoted a 2005 study regarding SARS, not COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Really Chinese Citizens Cram For Friday Prayer After Corona Virus Plague ?
Explanation: The video is a video of Chinese citizens carrying out Friday prayers taken in 2016, before the coronavirus was first reported in December 2019.

What fact-check ?: Massive live-pig burials COVID-19 outbreak .
Explanation: The burial is not new. Chinese goverment decided to kill pigs after African swine fever in 2018.

What fact-check ?: China Seeks Court ’ Approval To Kill 20000 coronavirus Patients .
Explanation: Post claiming China seeks court’s approval to kill 20000 coronavirus patients is fake.

What fact-check ?: This coronavirus-infected patient reached Dr. Vinod Kumar ’ given treatment . He later referred Bhagalpur . It states one avoid meat fish 3 months wear mask protect coronavirus .
Explanation: The post claiming that coronavirus infected patient reached Bihar and is not given treatment is fake. Health authorities dismiss the hoax report. Further, WHO has also not recommended to avoid fish and meat. It recommended thoroughly cooking meat and eggs. Wearing mask is, however, advisable.

What fact-check ?: Video says “ coronavirus invented patented USA planted China . ”
Explanation: There is no evidence the coronavirus was “invented.”

What fact-check ?: India developed treatment coronavirus .
Explanation: The headline of the viral article is misleading. So far, India has not claimed any such discovery.

What fact-check ?: Quarantined person fled facility Daegu south Korea ?
Explanation: The photos are manipulated.

What fact-check ?: Police military prepare total containment Canada .
Who said/posted it?: Text messages and Messenger direct messages
Explanation: Police and army confirmed it's false.

What fact-check ?: Cannabis boosts immunity CoV .
Explanation: There is no evidence to suggest that cannabis improves immunity against the virus.

What fact-check ?: Rainbow shimmers behind cov disinfectant truck China .
Explanation: It's from March 2019.

What fact-check ?: Those corpses street Wuhan .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article.

What fact-check ?: Social media posts claim Chloroquine , antimalarial drug cure COVID-19 .
Explanation: No health authorities have certified chloroquine as a cure for coronavirus. WHO, the foremost authority on the subject, according to the Director-General of the body, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, says while the organisation is currently conducting a number of drug trials, it does not expect a result before three weeks. More so, the “malarial chloroquine used in China was not one of the drugs.”

What fact-check ?: Chinese converting Islam realizing Muslim affected COVD19 country .
Explanation: Viral video is available on the internet since June 2019 and has no relation with the current outbreak of coronavirus in China.

What fact-check ?: 20 million Chinese convert Islam , coronavirus affect Muslims .
Explanation: The video doesn't feature Chinese people, but rather Filipino men. Video footage predates major coronavirus reports.

What fact-check ?: A Chinese man lynched pretended coronavirus .
Explanation: The man was Philippine and not Chinese. He was lynched because other people thought that he could potentially start spreading coronavirus Sars-Cov-2 in their city.

What fact-check ?: “ The Simpsons ” predicted coronavirus .
Explanation: An image from the show was altered to read “coronavirus”.

What fact-check ?: Is It Really That Mosques Across China Reopened After Corona Virus Plague ?
Explanation: a video of worship activities in the Dongguan Mosque, China. However, no news was found that the mosque was ever closed or reopened.

What fact-check ?: Chinese businessman Guo Wengui 's multiple allegations coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation:
- The outbreak was not a disaster in the mid of December. 
- The disease did not spread in US quickly after 18th of Feb. 
- Death rate is being updated day by day; not always same. 
- Wuhan's hospital capacity rise doesn't show the real number of infected. 
- Isolation centers in Wuhan are not concentration camps.

What fact-check ?: The drug `` arbidol '' help new coronavirus .
Explanation: The drug "arbidol" (other name - Umifenovir) is not proved to be a cure from coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: The State Qatar Did Not Report Any Infection Cases With COVID-19 .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar found after verification that the Ministry of Public Health in Qatar announced the registration of a confirmed case of respiratory syndrome in the Middle East for a 65-year-old.

What fact-check ?: Iraqi Ministry Health Demanded To Close The Border With Iran Because coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: The news is not true, as Misbar did not find it published in any official Iraqi media.

What fact-check ?: There way forbid religious gatehrings temporarily South Korea prevent virus spreading .
Explanation: They can be forbidden by the Korean infectious disease prevention law.

What fact-check ?: This snow artwork Wuhan .
Explanation: It's in another city, Shandong.

What fact-check ?: This map shows high sulphur dioxide Wuhan due burning corpses .
Explanation: Those are only forecasts based on past emissions.

What fact-check ?: Chinese people flee Vietnam due cov .
Explanation: The video is from november 2019.

What fact-check ?: Video showing racist reactions towards Asian people .
Explanation: Those are actors.

What fact-check ?: WHO considers canceling Mecca 's pilgrimage .
Explanation: WHO did not and could not take such a measure.

What fact-check ?: These charts claim show difference among COVID-19 , flu , common cold .
Explanation: Charts include inaccurate information about symptoms. They claim people suffering from the novel coronavirus do not develop some symptoms seen in flu or common cold patients, such as a runny or stuffy nose, a sore throat, vomiting, diarrhea and muscle pain, among others -- most of which can actually be seen among COVID-19 patients as well.

What fact-check ?: A suspicious case coronavirus Militay Hospital Maracay army member claimed visited China December .
Explanation: The journalist was misinformed and rushed to publish the information. Every source consulted explained the patient was never suspect or examinated for coronavirus becaue he came from Chine one month and a half ago.

What fact-check ?: A video Chinese epidemiologist saying millions infected .
Explanation: Same case of this Newtral verification: https://www.newtral.es/bulos-coronavirus-wuhan-casos-videos-teorias-conspiranoicas/20200225/.

What fact-check ?: Chinse people fleeing China Vietnam coronavirus .
Explanation: People are actually going from Vietnam to China for work.

What fact-check ?: Six coronavirus cases confirmed Wichita , Kansas .
Explanation: No cases were confirmed there, and claim came from non-credible websites.

What fact-check ?: Four people died Zanzibar handling chicken infected COVID-19 .
Who said/posted it?: Fake page impersonating ITV, a Tanzanian TV station
Explanation: A post claiming that four individuals in Zanzibar died from COVID-19 after handling a diseased chicken is false. The post contains images of a diseased chicken that circulated in other countries claiming to show symptoms of COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus arrived Sarajevo , Bosnia Herzegovina .
Who said/posted it?: Mainstream TV station, and then various online media
Explanation: Since the allegation that the coronavirus arrived in Sarajevo is presented in the title as fact and that there are no confirmations in the text of the articles, all the articles are rated as misinformation and clickbait.

What fact-check ?: Evacuation Yemeni Students Sultan Oman In China .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar verified the news and turned out to be fake.

What fact-check ?: Video showing Chinese officials detaining suspected coronavirus cases .
Explanation: The video shows a police drill in China during the novel coronavirus epidemic.

What fact-check ?: Pigs burried alive due coronavirus .
Explanation: The video is not recent and has nothing to do with coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Post says “ People Of Color May Be Immune To The Coronavirus Because Of Melanin . ”
Explanation: Melanin is a natural pigment that gives color to skin and eyes. It does not make you any less susceptible to coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Death A Child In Damascus Infected With coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar checked the circulating news, and found that the director general of Al-Mujtahid Hospital in Damascus, Dr. Samer Khadr, categorically denied any cases of COVID-19 infection.

What fact-check ?: A video showing anti-China protest amid COVID-19 outbreak Italy .
Explanation: The video show a march in Rome to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the assassination of Valerio Verbano, an Italian left-wing activist murdered in 1980.

What fact-check ?: A Facebook status 2012 talked spread coronavirus 2020 .
Explanation: The facebook status was updated on 27 Jan 2020.

What fact-check ?: Years ago , hand sanitizer active Sars-Cov-2 .
Explanation: The hand sanitizer is active against coronavirus in general. There is no specific sanitizer against Sars-Cov-2. Pagella Politica contacted the manufacturing company.

What fact-check ?: TV news said : Ketamine cure COVID-19 .
Explanation: There is no evidence that Ketamine can prevent or treat COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Many corpses South Taiwan sent Taichung burn . Taiwan serious communuity infection .
Explanation: The number of cremation in Taiwan hasn't increased significantly since the COVID-19 outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Map The Spread coronavirus In The Coming Months .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: The map in circulation is spurious, as Misbar investigated and found to be from Worldpop organization.

What fact-check ?: Pictures The Korean Delegation Infected With coronavirus In Palestine .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar verified the allegations and found that the delegation visited Palestine last January, according to the assurances of the tourer of the delegation, Ahmed Amayreh, which prompted some news sites, such as Ramallah News, to delete the photos and apologize.

What fact-check ?: A book D.Koontz ( The Eyes Darkness ) predicted COVID-19 1981 .
Explanation: The first edition of the book mentioned that the virus was invented by the Russians, rather then the Chinese. Moreover, real and imaginary viruses have almost nothing in common.

What fact-check ?: Radio host Rush Limbaugh compres novel coronavirus 'common cold ' .
Explanation: Novel coronavirus is more deadly from the viruses that can cause a cold, according to experts.

What fact-check ?: Cov case Uttar Pradesh district .
Explanation: Authorities denied.

What fact-check ?: Shoppers China storm supermarket cov outbreak .
Explanation: The video has circulated in media reports since at least October 2019, two months before the viral outbreak was first reported.

What fact-check ?: Chinese people convert islam cov .
Explanation: Video is from May 2019.

What fact-check ?: A Chinese SWAT Team takes coronavirus suspect
Explanation: A mock drill video was shared as China committing atrocites on its patients.

What fact-check ?: A 1981 book predicted coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: The book does talk about a virus called Wuhan-400, but it's not the same as COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: The link COVID-19 5G hidden .
Explanation: The link is not being hidden because it doesn't exist.

What fact-check ?: 2 coronavirus Sars-Cov-2 cases Bovalino ( Reggio Calabria , Italy ) .
Explanation: No Sars-Cov-2 cases at that time.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus Sars-Cov-2 Sant'Egidio ( Abruzzo , Italy ) .
Explanation: No Sars-Cov-2 cases at that time.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus Sars-Cov-2 sites Parabiago e Nerviano ( Lombardia , Italy )
Explanation: No coronavirus Sars-Cov-2 sites there at that time.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus Sars-Cov-2 Bosch company Bari ( Puglia ) Chinese people visited week .
Explanation: No Sars-Cov-2 cases at that time.

What fact-check ?: “ The coronavirus common cold , folks . ”
Explanation: The 2019 coronavirus is a new virus that had not been previously identified.

What fact-check ?: Taiwanese manufacturing awesome . One machine produce 2.5 million face masks per day .
Explanation: According to the Taiwanese Economy Ministry, each production line of face mask produces around 100,000 masks per day. The claimed video is miscaptioned as well.

What fact-check ?: Video shows suspected infected people eastern Turkey , Van .
Explanation: Video is not new. There is no proved COVID-19 case in Turkey by now.

What fact-check ?: Author Dean Koontz foresaw outbreak book .
Explanation: There is nothing common between the fictional virus in the book and current COVID-19 rather than Wuhan.

What fact-check ?: Video says President Donald Trump spawned “ Wuhan super virus outbreak code name ‘ zyphr . ’ ”
Explanation: There’s no evidence that President Trump had anything to do with the creation of the coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: Sensationalist article claiming Nostradamus predicted coronavirus .
Explanation: The predictions of Nostradamus are not correctly translated, and even if Nostradamus truly predicted a “plague”, the title of the original article says that it is taking place in a seaside town. The coronavirus originated in the city of Wuhan in China, which is not a seaside town, which can be confirmed by a simple Google search.

What fact-check ?: A Popular Video An Iranian Man Running After A Cleric Claiming To Be Infected With coronavirus .
Who said/posted it?: FaceBook accounts and Pages and Twitter Accounts
Explanation: Misbar found that the video has been published on Facebook since July 2017.

What fact-check ?: Person fainted subway station Covid-19 .
Explanation: It was not. It was another disease.

What fact-check ?: These measures supposedly protect novel coronavirus .
Explanation: Health experts refute new misleading claims about coronavirus prevention in Sri Lanka.

What fact-check ?: Cov infects chickens Pakistan .
Explanation: Authorities say it's related to another disease.

What fact-check ?: Infected taxi driver demands money government otherwise 'll infect others .
Explanation: Story originated from a parody account, no driver is threatneing to spread COVID-19 across Nigeria.

What fact-check ?: Photos Muslims Italy allegedly praying outside novel coronavirus .
Explanation: The photos have been published long before the COVID-19 outbreak.

What fact-check ?: Indian Government World Health Organization advised people purchase colours China Holi .
Explanation: No such advisory was shared by the government or the Ministry.

What fact-check ?: In Poland , people insured pay medical test coronavirus , ca n't afford , spread .
Explanation: He included a document from hospital which named the price for voluntary coronavirus test, for those who are not suspected of having coronavirus (they haven't been to affected areas nor they have medical signs of disease). Anyone who IS suspected of having coronavirus, will have medical examination free of charge, no matter if he's insured or not.

What fact-check ?: A 1981 book predicted coronavirus outbreak .
Explanation: There are coincidences, but it's not a prediction.

What fact-check ?: There crowd waiting greet Colombians living Wuhan flown Bogotá .
Explanation: The images are from 2018, when crowds gathered to meet the Colombian National Football Team after the World Cup in Russia.

What fact-check ?: Bats hide Wuhan rooftops caused COVID-19 outbreak .
Explanation: The video was filmed in Miami in 2011.

What fact-check ?: Video road traffic control China detect people infected coronavirus .
Explanation: The video was filmed in China, but it's a simulation, not a real incident.

What fact-check ?: Bats hide Wuhan rooftops caused COVID-19 outbreak .
Explanation: The video was recorded in the US in 2011.

What fact-check ?: China needs coronavirus SWAT ( special weapons tactics ) police team arrest drop dead virus victim .
Explanation: Video shows a mock drill by Tongbai police practicing to take down coronavirus infected patients in case they are uncooperative.

What fact-check ?: The claim book The Eyes Darkness predict spread coronavirus 1981 .
Explanation: The book is a work of fiction that mentions a biological weapon called Wuhan-400 (Originally Gorki-400) that has no similarities to the COVID-19. The other page, is from a totally different book “End of Days” by American psychic Sylvia Browne.

What fact-check ?: The name coronavirus disinfecting spray reaffirms virus known outbreak might planned .
Explanation: Coronaviruses have been known for decades. SARS and MERS were caused by coronaviruses. The companies (Lysol, Clorox,etc) have stated that their products have demonstrated effectiveness against viruses “similar” to COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus bioweapon leaked Wuhan lab .
Explanation: Already disproved similar claims. Scientists in Wuhan insisted no link between virus and labs.

What fact-check ?: Coronavirus patients `` cremated alive '' China .
Explanation: The Chinese government has ordered the swift cremation of patients who die after contracting the coronavirus. But there is no evidence they are being cremated alive.

What fact-check ?: Evidence indicates COVID-19 virus escaped Chinese lab researching , thus causing outbreak .
Who said/posted it?: Steven W. Mosher, New York Post
Explanation: Overall, Mosher’s argument is based on unfounded speculation and scientific inaccuracies. Multiple scientific studies have indicated that the virus has a natural origin, not the result of human engineering.

What fact-check ?: It weird unusual year . An ice tunami occurred Xingkai Lake Heilongjiang .
Explanation: The video of the ice tsunami was filmed at River Yenisey in Dudinka, Russia, in June 2019. Not in China.

What fact-check ?: An armored vehicle full corpses slipped trailer .
Explanation: It is a picture of an armored vehicle accident in Taichung. It has been miscaptioned.

What fact-check ?: The DPP ( Democratic Progressive Party ) politician Wang Shijian said Taiwan 500 confirmed cases .
Explanation: The DPP councilor Wang Shijian has denied making such a statement. As to Feb. 25., 2020, Taiwan has 31 confirmed cases, one death toll

What fact-check ?: Vaccine COVID-19 found .
Explanation: Chinese ambrassador to Russia announced that they are making progress. No vaccine for COVID-19 yet.

What fact-check ?: Said mortality rate flu “ right around ” new coronavirus : “ It ’ right around 2 % . ”
Explanation: The mortality rate for the flu is considered by most experts to be about 0.1%. Estimates for the mortality rate for coronavirus are currently around 2%, but this number could change depending on how cases are diagnosed.

What fact-check ?: China creates meat dead bodies coronavirus victims transport Africa .
Explanation: The photos used in the claim came from different sources: 1. some from a store in london was selling for Resident Evil game 2. most images are sculptures made from bread  3. some photos are from burying ritual in China.

What fact-check ?: Trump claims virus control testing available .
Explanation: The president spent nearly two months issuing confusing and contradictory signals — leaving the bureaucratic machine of the U.S. government to chart the course for the coronavirus response.

What fact-check ?: The Chinese accept Islam en masse ( 20 millions ) .
Explanation: Video was published with misleading header. After our fact-check some authors changed descriptions for their videos but this hoax is still circulating on WhatsApp.

What fact-check ?: A `` Letter '' uncle Wuhan claims COVID-19 cured hot water .
Explanation: There is no evidence hot water can cure COVID-19, other facts stated in the said letter are not accurate as well.

What fact-check ?: Chinese people convert islam cov .
Explanation: It s an old video, not related to CoV.

What fact-check ?: CDC issued facial hair recommendation novel coronavirus prevention .
Explanation: Graphic is more than two years old and is unrelated to current outbreak.

What fact-check ?: There confirmed case coronavirus Bogotá hospital .
Explanation: The case was never treated under the suspicion it was coronavirus.

What fact-check ?: You maintain alkaline state body avoid contagion .
Explanation: Please click the link to read the full article

What fact-check ?: Letters packages sent China way infection .
Explanation: Viruses can live for some time in objects like door knobs. WHO has declares COVID-19 can't live very long in envelopes and boxes.

What fact-check ?: Face masks good protection system coronavirus .
Explanation: Masks are not a good way of protection unless your are a health professional or your are in contact with somebody infected.

What fact-check ?: A monkey infected coronavirus photo .
Explanation: The photo is a capture of a video taken at least two months before the first symtoms of COVID-19.

What fact-check ?: The new coronavirus registered 2004 .
Explanation: It was another type of coronavirus that was registered in 2004, not the one that caused the current outbreak.

What fact-check ?: School suspended Catalonia March 2 .
Explanation: It's not a real statement by the Catalonian education department.

What fact-check ?: New cases coronavirus Madrid linked two universities club .
Explanation: Images of articles published by El Mundo related to coronavirus were manipulated.

What fact-check ?: Two cases confirmed coronavirus Huelva , Andalucía ( February 26th )
Who said/posted it?: Sent via WhatsApp and Facebook posts
Explanation: Andalusian health ministry denied cases of coronavirus in the Spanish region.

What fact-check ?: Is useful close borders stop outbreak ?
Explanation: French medical experts say closing borders in order to prevent infected people from entering in France is ineffective. Likewise, health tests before entering the country have little effect.

What fact-check ?: Hair Weaves And Lace Front Wigs Made In China Likely To Contain coronavirus .
Explanation: There is very little chance of coronavirus spreading this way, and there have not been any reported cases of this happening.

What fact-check ?: Cocaine kills coronavirus .
Explanation: Fake story was generated by a website that allows people to create their own news stories. Previously busted claim.

What fact-check ?: Italian Red Cross gives recipe making amuchina ( hand sanitizer ) home .
Explanation: Italian Red Cross has never shared any receipe. The receipe shared isn't the real one and could be useful only to disinfect vegetables.

What fact-check ?: “ Hair weave lace fronts manufactured China may contain coronavirus . ”
Explanation: The Food and Drug Administration has found no evidence that the virus is spreading via imports.

What fact-check ?: “ coronavirus : Florida man arrested robbery using cough weapon . ”
Explanation: This screenshot of “breaking news” is originally from a satirical news site. If you look closely, you’ll see a news generator watermark in the top right corner, meaning the image was created.

What fact-check ?: Says CDC recommends men shave beards protect coronavirus .
Explanation: A 2017 CDC infographic shows how facial hair could interfere with respirator masks. The graphic is unrelated to coronavirus protection and the CDC has not recommended people should shave their beards to ward off the virus.

What fact-check ?: China took advantage coronavirus crisis buy back stocks technology companies belonging foreign investors .
Who said/posted it?: Local online media published it, then local member on parliament said it on TV, then other media picked up the story
Explanation:
This is the story in full : Previously, stocks of technology companies, belonged to Europeans and Americans foreign investors.
Due to the situation in Wuhan, Juan began to decline, but the Central Bank did nothing to support Juan.
And when the price fell, below the allowable limit, XI JINPING gave the order, at one point, to buy ALL the shares of Europeans and Americans.
Not only has China made $ 20 billion, but these days it has returned the shares of its companies to China. The story is completely fabricated and there is no evidence for it. In fact, the story was published back in 2014 - but it was not the Chinese but the Russian president at the time, and the emergency was not because of the corona but because of the crime. The media only changed the name of the country, the president, the currency and the reason for the emergency and re-published the story.

What fact-check ?: Russian CDC admitted COVID-19 human-made .
Explanation:
The original document from the Russian health ministry only mentions that COVID-19 is
a recombinant virus. It doesn't suggest the COVID-19 is a human-made virus.

What fact-check ?: Many corposes floated river Tainan , Southern city Taiwan .
Explanation: They are stage photos from Korean movies "Deranged" and "Train To Busan".

What fact-check ?: `` DDP ( Democratic Progressive Party ) legislator Kao Chia-yu gave mom two boxed face mask since DDP plenty said outbreak control . ''
Explanation: Legislator Kao denied making such a comment. There are several factual inaccuracies in the claim.
